Built with Alectryon, running Coq+SerAPI v8.13.0+0.13.0. Bubbles () indicate interactive fragments: hover for details, tap to reveal contents. Use Ctrl+↑ Ctrl+↓ to navigate, Ctrl+🖱️ to focus. On Mac, use ⌘ instead of Ctrl.
From stdpp Require Import prelude finite.
From Coq Require Import FinFun.
From VLSM Require Import Lib.Preamble.

Utility lemmas about lists

A list is empty if it has no members 
X: Type
l: list X
(∀ v : X, ¬ In v l) → l = []


X: Type
l: list X
(∀ v : X, ¬ In v l) → l = []

  
X: Type
l: list X
(∀ v : X, ¬ In v l) → l = []

  
X: Type
(∀ v : X, ¬ In v []) → [] = []
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(∀ v : X, ¬ In v (a :: l)) → a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(∀ v : X, ¬ In v (a :: l)) → a :: l = []

  
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(∀ v : X, ¬ (a = v ∨ In v l)) → a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: ∀ v : X, ¬ (a = v ∨ In v l)
a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: ∀ v : X, ¬ (a = v ∨ In v l)
a = a ∨ In a l
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: ∀ v : X, ¬ (a = v ∨ In v l)
a = a
 reflexivity.
Qed.
It is decidable whether a list is null or not 
S: Type
l: list S
Decision (l = [])


S: Type
l: list S
Decision (l = [])

  destruct l; [left; reflexivity|right; congruence].
Qed.
A list is either null or it can be decomposed into an initial prefix and a last element 
S: Type
l: list S
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}


S: Type
l: list S
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}

  
S: Type
l: list S
e: l = []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}
S: Type
l: list S
n: l ≠ []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}

  
S: Type
l: list S
e: l = []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}
 
S: Type
l: list S
e: l = []
l = []
 assumption.
  
S: Type
l: list S
n: l ≠ []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}
 
S: Type
l: list S
n: l ≠ []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}}
 
S: Type
l: list S
n: {l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}}
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}}
 assumption.
Qed.
destructs a list in @l@ in either null or a prefix @l'@ and a last element @a@ with an equation @Heq@ stating that @l = l' ++ a@ 
Ltac destruct_list_last l l' a Heq :=
 destruct (has_last_or_null l) as [[l' [a Heq]] | Heq]; rewrite Heq in *; swap 1 2.


S: Type
l: list S
a: S
l ++ [a] ≠ []


S: Type
l: list S
a: S
l ++ [a] ≠ []

  
S: Type
l: list S
a: S
contra: l ++ [a] = []
False
 destruct l; discriminate contra.
Qed.

Definition last_error {S} (l : list S) : option S :=
  match l with
  | [] => None
  | a :: t => Some (List.last t a)
  end.


S: Type
∀ (random a b : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: l) random


S: Type
∀ (random a b : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: l) random

  
S: Type
random, h1, h2: S
tl: list S
List.last (h1 :: h2 :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: tl) random

  
S: Type
random, h1, h2: S
tl: list S
List.last (h1 :: h2 :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: tl) random
 reflexivity.
Qed.


S: Type
∀ (random a b c : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: c :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: a :: c :: l) random


S: Type
∀ (random a b c : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: c :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: a :: c :: l) random

  
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s: S
tl: list S
List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: tl) random

  
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s: S
List.last [h1; h2; s] random =
List.last [h2; h1; s] random
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s, hd: S
tl: list S
IHl: List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: tl) random
List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: hd :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: hd :: tl) random

  
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s: S
List.last [h1; h2; s] random =
List.last [h2; h1; s] random
 reflexivity.
  
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s, hd: S
tl: list S
IHl: List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: tl) random
List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: hd :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: hd :: tl) random
 
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s, hd: S
tl: list S
IHl: List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: tl) random
match tl with
| [] => hd
| _ :: _ => List.last tl random
end =
match tl with
| [] => hd
| _ :: _ => List.last tl random
end
 reflexivity.
Qed.


X: Type
∀ (hd1 hd2 d1 d2 : X) (tl : list X),
  List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
  List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2


X: Type
∀ (hd1 hd2 d1 d2 : X) (tl : list X),
  List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
  List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2: X
tl: list X
List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
 
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2: X
List.last [hd1; hd2] d1 = List.last [hd2] d2
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: a :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2: X
hd2 = hd2
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: a :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2
 
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: a :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (a :: tl) d1 = List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (a :: tl) d1 = List.last (a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
IHtl: List.last [hd2] d1 = List.last [hd2] d2
List.last [a] d1 = List.last [a] d2
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a, x: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd2 :: x :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: x :: tl) d2
List.last (a :: x :: tl) d1 =
List.last (a :: x :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a, x: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd2 :: x :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: x :: tl) d2
List.last (a :: x :: tl) d1 =
List.last (a :: x :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a, x: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (x :: tl) d1 = List.last (x :: tl) d2
List.last (a :: x :: tl) d1 =
List.last (a :: x :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a, x: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (x :: tl) d1 = List.last (x :: tl) d2
List.last (x :: tl) d1 = List.last (x :: tl) d2

  assumption.
Qed.


S: Type
∀ (random a : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: l) random = List.last l a


S: Type
∀ (random a : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: l) random = List.last l a

  
S: Type
random, a, a0: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: l) random = List.last l a
List.last (a :: a0 :: l) random =
List.last (a0 :: l) a

  
S: Type
random, a, a0, s: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (s :: l) a
List.last (a :: a0 :: s :: l) random =
List.last (a0 :: s :: l) a

  
S: Type
random, a, a0, s: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (s :: l) a
List.last (a0 :: a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (a0 :: s :: l) a
 
S: Type
random, a, a0, s: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (s :: l) a
List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (a0 :: s :: l) a
 
S: Type
random, a, a0, s: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (s :: l) a
List.last (s :: l) a = List.last (a0 :: s :: l) a

  
S: Type
random, a, a0, s: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (s :: l) a
List.last (s :: l) a = List.last (s :: l) a
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
def: A
List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
def: A
List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)

  
A: Type
l1, l2: list A
∀ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: ∀ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)
def: A
List.last ((a :: l1) ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last (a :: l1) def)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: ∀ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)
def: A
List.last (a :: l1 ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last (a :: l1) def)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: ∀ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)
def: A
List.last (l1 ++ l2) a = List.last l2 (List.last l1 a)

  apply IHl1.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → B
h: A
t: list A
def: B
List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)


A, B: Type
f: A → B
h: A
t: list A
def: B
List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
h: A
t: list A
∀ def : B,
  List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)
 
A, B: Type
f: A → B
t: list A
∀ (h : A) (def : B),
  List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
a: A
t: list A
IHt: ∀ (h : A) (def : B), List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)
h: A
def: B
List.last (map f (h :: a :: t)) def =
f (List.last (a :: t) h)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
a: A
t: list A
IHt: ∀ (h : A) (def : B), List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)
h: A
def: B
List.last (f h :: map f (a :: t)) def =
f (List.last (a :: t) h)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
a: A
t: list A
IHt: ∀ (h : A) (def : B), List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)
h: A
def: B
List.last (map f (a :: t)) (f h) = f (List.last t a)

  apply IHt.
Qed.


S: Type
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: last_error l = Some s
List.last l random = s


S: Type
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: last_error l = Some s
List.last l random = s

  
S: Type
s, random: S
Herr: last_error [] = Some s
List.last [] random = s
S: Type
s0: S
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: last_error (s0 :: l) = Some s
List.last (s0 :: l) random = s

  
S: Type
s, random: S
Herr: last_error [] = Some s
List.last [] random = s
 
S: Type
s, random: S
Herr: None = Some s
random = s
 discriminate Herr.
  
S: Type
s0: S
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: last_error (s0 :: l) = Some s
List.last (s0 :: l) random = s
 
S: Type
s0: S
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: Some (List.last l s0) = Some s
List.last (s0 :: l) random = s
 
S: Type
s0: S
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: Some (List.last l s0) = Some s
H0: List.last l s0 = s
List.last (s0 :: l) random = List.last l s0

    apply unroll_last.
Qed.


∀ (A : Type) (l : list A), incl l [] → l = []


∀ (A : Type) (l : list A), incl l [] → l = []

  
A: Type
l: list A
H: incl l []
l = []
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: incl (a :: l) []
a :: l = []

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: incl (a :: l) []
False
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: incl (a :: l) []
In a (a :: l)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: incl (a :: l) []
a = a
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
∀ (l : list A) (a : A),
  incl l [a] → ∀ b : A, In b l → b = a


A: Type
∀ (l : list A) (a : A),
  incl l [a] → ∀ b : A, In b l → b = a

  
A: Type
l: list A
a: A
H: incl l [a]
b: A
H0: In b l
b = a
 
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H0: In b (b :: l)
H: incl (b :: l) [a]
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
b = a
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
H1: In b l
b = a

  
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H0: In b (b :: l)
H: incl (b :: l) [a]
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
b = a
 
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H: incl (b :: l) [a]
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
b = a
 
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H: incl (b :: l) [a]
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
H0: In b []
b = a

    inversion H0.
  
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
H1: In b l
b = a
 
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
H1: In b l
incl l [a]

    
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
H1: In b l
incl l (a0 :: l)

    
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] → In b l → b = a
H1: In b l
incl l l
 apply incl_refl.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
x: A
s: list A
In x s → P x → In x (filter P s)


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
x: A
s: list A
In x s → P x → In x (filter P s)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
x: A
s: list A
H0: In x s
H1: P x
In x (filter P s)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
x: A
s: list A
H0: In x s
H1: P x
x ∈ filter P s

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
x: A
s: list A
H0: x ∈ s
H1: P x
x ∈ filter P s

  apply elem_of_list_filter; auto.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s1, s2: list A
incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s1, s2: list A
incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s2: list A
H0: incl [] s2
x: A
H1: In x (filter P [])
In x (filter P s2)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
H1: In x (filter P (a :: s1))
In x (filter P s2)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s2: list A
H0: incl [] s2
x: A
H1: In x (filter P [])
In x (filter P s2)
 contradict H1; auto.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
H1: In x (filter P (a :: s1))
In x (filter P s2)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
H1: In x
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P s1
   else filter P s1)
In x (filter P s2)

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
p: P a
H1: In x (a :: filter P s1)
In x (filter P s2)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
n: ¬ P a
H1: In x (filter P s1)
In x (filter P s2)

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
p: P a
H1: In x (a :: filter P s1)
In x (filter P s2)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
p: P a
H1: a = x
In x (filter P s2)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
p: P a
H1: In x (filter P s1)
In x (filter P s2)

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
H0: incl (a :: s1) s2
x: A
p: P a
H1: a = x
In x (filter P s2)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
x: A
p: P x
H0: incl (x :: s1) s2
In x (filter P s2)
 
A: Type

s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
x: A
p: P x
H0: incl (x :: s1) s2
In x s2

s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
x: A
p: P x
H0: incl (x :: s1) s2
In x (x :: s1)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: incl s1 s2 → incl (filter P s1) (filter P s2)
x: A
p: P x
H0: incl (x :: s1) s2
x = x
 reflexivity.

A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
(∀ a : A, P a → Q a)
→ ∀ s : list A, incl (filter P s) (filter Q s)


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
(∀ a : A, P a → Q a)
→ ∀ s : list A, incl (filter P s) (filter Q s)

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
incl (filter P []) (filter Q [])
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: incl (filter P s) (filter Q s)
incl (filter P (a :: s)) (filter Q (a :: s))

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
incl (filter P []) (filter Q [])
 apply incl_refl.
  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: incl (filter P s) (filter Q s)
incl (filter P (a :: s)) (filter Q (a :: s))
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: incl (filter P s) (filter Q s)
x: A
H2: In x (filter P (a :: s))
In x (filter Q (a :: s))

    
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: incl (filter P s) (filter Q s)
x: A
H2: In x
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P s
   else filter P s)
In x (filter Q (a :: s))

A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) []
0 ≤ 0
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s → length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
length (filter P (a :: s))
≤ length (filter Q (a :: s))

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) []
0 ≤ 0
 lia.
  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s → length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
length (filter P (a :: s))
≤ length (filter Q (a :: s))
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s → length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
length (filter P (a :: s))
≤ length (filter Q (a :: s))
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
length (filter P (a :: s))
≤ length (filter Q (a :: s))

    
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
length
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P s
   else filter P s)
≤ length
    (if decide (Q a)
     then a :: filter Q s
     else filter Q s)

    
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
length (a :: filter P s)
≤ length
    (if decide (Q a)
     then a :: filter Q s
     else filter Q s)
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
length (filter P s)
≤ length
    (if decide (Q a)
     then a :: filter Q s
     else filter Q s)

    
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
length (a :: filter P s)
≤ length
    (if decide (Q a)
     then a :: filter Q s
     else filter Q s)
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
q: Q a
length (a :: filter P s) ≤ length (a :: filter Q s)
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
n: ¬ Q a
length (a :: filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)

      
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
q: Q a
length (a :: filter P s) ≤ length (a :: filter Q s)
 simpl; lia.
      
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
n: ¬ Q a
length (a :: filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
Q a
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
p: P a
P a
 assumption.
    
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
length (filter P s)
≤ length
    (if decide (Q a)
     then a :: filter Q s
     else filter Q s)
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
q: Q a
length (filter P s) ≤ length (a :: filter Q s)
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
n0: ¬ Q a
length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)

      
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
q: Q a
length (filter P s) ≤ length (a :: filter Q s)
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
q: Q a
length (filter P s) ≤ S (length (filter Q s))
 lia.
      
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
Hfg: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) (a :: s)
IHs: length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
H3: P a → Q a
H4: Forall (λ a : A, P a → Q a) s
n: ¬ P a
n0: ¬ Q a
length (filter P s) ≤ length (filter Q s)
 apply IHs.
Qed.


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
s: list A
(∀ a : A, In a s → P a ↔ Q a)
→ filter P s = filter Q s


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
s: list A
(∀ a : A, In a s → P a ↔ Q a)
→ filter P s = filter Q s

 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
IHs: (∀ a : A, In a s → P a ↔ Q a) → filter P s = filter Q s
H1: ∀ a0 : A, In a0 (a :: s) → P a0 ↔ Q a0
filter P (a :: s) = filter Q (a :: s)

H1: ∀ a0 : A, In a0 (a :: s) → P a0 ↔ Q a0
filter P (a :: s) = filter Q (a :: s)

filter P (a :: s) = filter Q (a :: s)

H2: In a0 s
P a0 ↔ Q a0

A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
IHs: (∀ a : A, In a s → P a ↔ Q a) → filter P s = filter Q s
H1: ∀ a0 : A, In a0 (a :: s) → P a0 ↔ Q a0
IHs': ∀ a : A, In a s → P a ↔ Q a
filter P (a :: s) = filter Q (a :: s)

 
A: Type

H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)

s: list A

P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)

IHs': filter P s = filter Q s
filter P (a :: s) = filter Q (a :: s)

 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
H1: ∀ a0 : A, In a0 (a :: s) → P a0 ↔ Q a0
IHs': filter P s = filter Q s
(if decide (P a) then a :: filter P s else filter P s) =
(if decide (Q a) then a :: filter Q s else filter Q s)

(if decide (Q a) then a :: filter Q s else filter Q s)

     left; reflexivity.
   
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
a: A
s: list A
H1: ∀ a0 : A, In a0 (a :: s) → P a0 ↔ Q a0
IHs': filter P s = filter Q s
n: ¬ P a
n0: ¬ Q a
filter P s = filter Q s
 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
Forall (λ a : A, ¬ P a) l ↔ filter P l = []


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
Forall (λ a : A, ¬ P a) l ↔ filter P l = []

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
(∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x) ↔ filter P l = []

filter P l = []

∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x

IHl: (∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x) → filter P l = []
filter P (a :: l) = []

A: Type

a: A

IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
¬ P a
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
Hnone: filter P (a :: l) = []
IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
x: A
H2: x ∈ l
¬ P x

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
Hnone: filter P (a :: l) = []
IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
¬ P a
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
Hnone: (if decide (P a)
 then a :: filter P l
 else filter P l) = []
IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
¬ P a

      destruct (decide (P a)); [inversion Hnone|assumption].
    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
Hnone: filter P (a :: l) = []
IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
x: A
H2: x ∈ l
¬ P x
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
Hnone: (if decide (P a)
 then a :: filter P l
 else filter P l) = []
IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
x: A
H2: x ∈ l
¬ P x

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n: ¬ P a
Hnone: filter P l = []
IHl: filter P l = [] → ∀ x : A, x ∈ l → ¬ P x
x: A
H2: x ∈ l
¬ P x

      apply IHl; assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P l
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix



A: Type
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P l
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
p: P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
p: P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
p: P a
P a ∧ a :: l = [] ++ [a] ++ l ∧ ¬ Exists P []

    
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
p: P a
P a ∧ a :: l = [] ++ [a] ++ l ∧ ¬ False

    tauto.
  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hsomething: P a ∨ Exists P l
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

    
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
H: Exists P l
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

    
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
IHl: ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

    
A: Type
a: A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hf: P first
Hnone_before: ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
∃ (prefix0 suffix0 : list A) (first0 : A),
  P first0
  ∧ a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
    prefix0 ++ [first0] ++ suffix0
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix0

    
A: Type
a: A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hf: P first
Hnone_before: ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
P first
∧ a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
  (a :: prefix) ++ [first] ++ suffix
  ∧ ¬ Exists P (a :: prefix)

    
A: Type
a: A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hf: P first
Hnone_before: ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
P first
∧ a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
  (a :: prefix) ++ [first] ++ suffix
  ∧ ¬ (P a ∨ Exists P prefix)

    tauto.
Qed.


∀ (A : Type) (x y : A) (l : list A),
  x ∈ l → y ∉ l → x ≠ y


∀ (A : Type) (x y : A) (l : list A),
  x ∈ l → y ∉ l → x ≠ y

  
A: Type
x, y: A
l: list A
H: x ∈ l
H0: y ∉ l
x ≠ y
 
A: Type
y: A
l: list A
H: y ∈ l
H0: y ∉ l
False
 
A: Type
y: A
l: list A
H: y ∈ l
H0: y ∉ l
y ∈ l
 assumption.
Qed.

Definition inb {A} (Aeq_dec : forall x y:A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A) :=
  if in_dec Aeq_dec x xs then true else false.


A: Type
Aeq_dec: ∀ x y : A, {x = y} + {x ≠ y}
PredicateFunction2 (In (A:=A)) (inb Aeq_dec)


A: Type
Aeq_dec: ∀ x y : A, {x = y} + {x ≠ y}
PredicateFunction2 (In (A:=A)) (inb Aeq_dec)

  
A: Type
Aeq_dec: ∀ x y : A, {x = y} + {x ≠ y}
x: A
xs: list A
In x xs ↔ inb Aeq_dec x xs = true
 
A: Type
Aeq_dec: ∀ x y : A, {x = y} + {x ≠ y}
x: A
xs: list A
In x xs
↔ (if in_dec Aeq_dec x xs then true else false) = true
 destruct (in_dec Aeq_dec x xs); split; intros
  ; try assumption; try reflexivity; try contradiction; discriminate.
Qed.


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
∀ (l : list X) (x : X),
  In x l ↔ inb decide_eq x l = true


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
∀ (l : list X) (x : X),
  In x l ↔ inb decide_eq x l = true

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
In msg s ↔ inb decide_eq msg s = true

  apply in_function.
Qed.


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
∀ (l : list X) (x : X), In x l ↔ inb decide_eq x l


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
∀ (l : list X) (x : X), In x l ↔ inb decide_eq x l

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
In msg s ↔ inb decide_eq msg s

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
inb decide_eq msg s ↔ inb decide_eq msg s

  reflexivity.
Qed.


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
∀ (l : list X) (x : X),
  ¬ In x l ↔ inb decide_eq x l = false


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
∀ (l : list X) (x : X),
  ¬ In x l ↔ inb decide_eq x l = false

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
¬ In msg s ↔ inb decide_eq msg s = false

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
inb decide_eq msg s = false
↔ inb decide_eq msg s = false

  reflexivity.
Qed.

Definition inclb
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l1 l2 : list A)
  : bool
  := forallb (fun x : A => inb decide_eq x l2) l1.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
PredicateFunction2 (incl (A:=A)) inclb


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
PredicateFunction2 (incl (A:=A)) inclb

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2 ↔ inclb l1 l2 = true
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2
↔ forallb (λ x : A, inb decide_eq x l2) l1 = true
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2
↔ (∀ x : A, In x l1 → inb decide_eq x l2 = true)

  split; intros Hincl x Hx; apply in_correct; apply Hincl; assumption.
Qed.

Definition incl_correct `{EqDecision A}
  (l1 l2 : list A)
  : incl l1 l2 <-> inclb l1 l2 = true
  := incl_function l1 l2.


A, B: Type
f: B → A
∀ s s' : list B, incl s s' → incl (map f s) (map f s')


A, B: Type
f: B → A
∀ s s' : list B, incl s s' → incl (map f s) (map f s')

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
Hin: In fx (map f s)
In fx (map f s')

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
Hin: In fx (map f s)
∃ x : B, f x = fx ∧ In x s'

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
Hin: ∃ x : B, f x = fx ∧ In x s
∃ x : B, f x = fx ∧ In x s'

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
x: B
Heq: f x = fx
Hin: In x s
∃ x : B, f x = fx ∧ In x s'

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
x: B
Heq: f x = fx
Hin: In x s
f x = fx ∧ In x s'
 
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
x: B
Heq: f x = fx
Hin: In x s
In x s'
 
A, B: Type
f: B → A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
x: B
Heq: f x = fx
Hin: In x s
In x s
 assumption.
Qed.

Definition app_cons {A}
  (a : A)
  (l : list A)
  : [a] ++ l = a :: l
  := eq_refl.


A: Type
∀ l1 l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → List.NoDup l1


A: Type
∀ l1 l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → List.NoDup l1

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ([] ++ l2)
List.NoDup []
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
List.NoDup (a :: l1)

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ([] ++ l2)
List.NoDup []
 constructor.

A: Type
∀ l1 l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1) → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)


A: Type
∀ l1 l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1) → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H: NoDup (a :: l1)
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
NoDup (a :: l1 ++ l2)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
NoDup (a :: l1 ++ l2)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
a ∉ l1 ++ l2
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A

  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A

H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1

NoDup (l1 ++ l2)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A

  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)

H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1

a ∉ l1 ++ l2
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
H: a ∈ l1 ++ l2
False
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
H: a ∈ l1 ∨ a ∈ l2
False
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
Inl1: a ∈ l1
False
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
InL2: a ∈ l2
False

    
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
Inl1: a ∈ l1
False
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
Inl1: a ∈ l1
a ∈ l1
 assumption.
    
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A
H0: NoDup l2
H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
InL2: a ∈ l2
False
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)

H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2
H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1

a ∈ a :: l1

      left.
  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)

H2: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ l2 → a0 ∉ a :: l1
H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
l2: list A

A: Type

a: A

    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)

A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)
        → NoDup (l1 ++ l2)

H1: ∀ a0 : A, a0 ∈ a :: l1 → a0 ∉ l2

H5: a ∉ l1
H6: NoDup l1
a0: A

H3: a0 ∈ l1
False

a: A
l1: list A

  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2
    → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l1 → a ∉ l2)
      → (∀ a : A, a ∈ l2 → a ∉ l1)

A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  NoDup l1
  → NoDup l2

Qed.


A: Type
∀ (l : list A) (x dummy : A),
  List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x


A: Type
∀ (l : list A) (x dummy : A),
  List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ x dummy : A, List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
x, dummy: A
List.last ((a :: l) ++ [x]) dummy = x

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ x dummy : A, List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
x, dummy: A
List.last (a :: l ++ [x]) dummy = x
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
x, dummy: A
IHl: List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
List.last (a :: l ++ [x]) dummy = x
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
x, dummy: A
IHl: List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
List.last (a :: l ++ [x]) dummy =
List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
x, dummy: A
IHl: List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
match l ++ [x] with
| [] => a
| _ :: _ => List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy
end = List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy

  destruct l; simpl; reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
∀ (l : list A) (x : A), last_error (l ++ [x]) = Some x


A: Type
∀ (l : list A) (x : A), last_error (l ++ [x]) = Some x

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
x: A
Some (List.last (l ++ [x]) a) = Some x
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
x: A
List.last (l ++ [x]) a = x
 apply last_is_last.
Qed.
Polymorphic list library 
Fixpoint is_member {W} `{StrictlyComparable W} (w : W) (l : list W) : bool :=
  match l with
  | [] => false
  | hd :: tl => match compare w hd with
              | Eq => true
              | _ => is_member w tl
              end
  end.

Definition compareb {A} `{StrictlyComparable A} (a1 a2 : A) : bool :=
  match compare a1 a2 with
  | Eq => true
  | _ => false
  end.


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
∀ (l : list W) (w : W), is_member w l = true ↔ In w l


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
∀ (l : list W) (w : W), is_member w l = true ↔ In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
is_member w l = true ↔ In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
is_member w [] = true ↔ In w []
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true ↔ In w (hd :: tl)

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
is_member w [] = true ↔ In w []
 
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
H': is_member w [] = true
In w []
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
H': In w []
is_member w [] = true

    
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
H': is_member w [] = true
In w []
 unfold is_member in H'; inversion H'.
    
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
H': In w []
is_member w [] = true
 inversion H'.
  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true ↔ In w (hd :: tl)
 
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
H': is_member w (hd :: tl) = true
In w (hd :: tl)
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
H': In w (hd :: tl)
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true

    
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
H': is_member w (hd :: tl) = true
In w (hd :: tl)
 
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
H': match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true
In w (hd :: tl)

      
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
Hcmp: compare w hd = Eq
H': true = true
In w (hd :: tl)

      
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
Hcmp: w = hd
H': true = true
In w (hd :: tl)

      
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
Hcmp: w = hd
H': true = true
hd = w
 symmetry; assumption.
    
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
H': In w (hd :: tl)
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true
 
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
H': hd = w ∨ In w tl
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true

      
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
eq: hd = w
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
neq: In w tl
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true

      
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
eq: hd = w
is_member w (w :: tl) = true

hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
neq: In w tl
is_member w (hd :: tl) = true

      
W: Type

hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
eq: hd = w
match compare w w with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true

W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
eq: hd = w
true = true

is_member w (hd :: tl) = true

match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl

W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
neq: is_member w tl = true
H_dec: Decision (w = hd)
match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true

tl: list W

Heq: w = hd
match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true

hd: W
tl: list W
w: W

neq: is_member w tl = true
Hneq: w ≠ hd
match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true

      
W: Type

hd: W
tl: list W
w: W

neq: is_member w tl = true
Heq: w = hd
match compare hd hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member hd tl
end = true
W: Type

hd: W

w: W

neq: is_member w tl = true

match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true
 
W: Type

hd: W
tl: list W
w: W

neq: is_member w tl = true
Heq: w = hd
true = true
W: Type

hd: W
tl: list W
w: W

match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true
 
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true ↔ In w tl
neq: is_member w tl = true
Hneq: w ≠ hd
match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true

      destruct (compare w hd); try reflexivity;
        assumption.
Qed.


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
∀ (l : list W) (w : W),
  is_member w l = false ↔ ¬ In w l


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
∀ (l : list W) (w : W),
  is_member w l = false ↔ ¬ In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
is_member w l = false ↔ ¬ In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
∀ x : list W, is_member w x = true ↔ In w x

  intros; apply is_member_correct.
Qed.


X: Type
∀ (l1 l2 : list X) (x : X),
  In x (l1 ++ l2) ↔ In x (l2 ++ l1)


X: Type
∀ (l1 l2 : list X) (x : X),
  In x (l1 ++ l2) ↔ In x (l2 ++ l1)

  intros l1 l2 x; split; intro H_in;
  apply in_or_app; apply in_app_or in H_in;
    destruct H_in as [cat | dog];
    tauto.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlast: S n = length l
_last: A
nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlast: S n = length l
_last: A
nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlast: S n = length l
∀ _last : A, nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
n: nat
∀ l : list A,
  S n = length l
  → ∀ _last : A,
      nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length l
_last: A
nth_error l 0 = Some (List.last l _last)
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A,
  S n = length l
  → ∀ _last : A,
      nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
l: list A
Hlast: S (S n) = length l
_last: A
nth_error l (S n) = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length l
_last: A
nth_error l 0 = Some (List.last l _last)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: 0 = length l
nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: length l = 0
nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)

    
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: l = []
nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)
 
A: Type
a: A
Hlast: 1 = length [a]
_last: A
nth_error [a] 0 = Some (List.last [a] _last)
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A,
S n = length l → ∀ _last : A, nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
l: list A
Hlast: S (S n) = length l
_last: A
nth_error l (S n) = Some (List.last l _last)
 
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A,
S n = length l → ∀ _last : A, nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: S n = length l
nth_error (a :: l) (S n) =
Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)

    
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
nth_error (a :: l) (S n) =
Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)
 
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
nth_error (a :: l) (S n) = Some (List.last l a)

    
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
nth_error l n = Some (List.last l a)
 
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
Some (List.last l _last) = Some (List.last l a)
 
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
List.last l _last = List.last l a

    
A: Type
n: nat
a0: A
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error (a0 :: l) n =
Some (List.last (a0 :: l) _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: a0 :: l)
H0: S n = length (a0 :: l)
H1: n = length l
List.last (a0 :: l) _last = List.last (a0 :: l) a

    
A: Type
n: nat
a0: A
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error (a0 :: l) n =
Some (List.last (a0 :: l) _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: a0 :: l)
H0: S n = length (a0 :: l)
H1: n = length l
List.last l a0 = List.last l a0

    reflexivity.
Qed.

Fixpoint list_suffix
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  (n : nat)
  {struct n}
  : list A
  := match n,l with
    | 0,_ => l
    | _,[] => []
    | S n, a :: l => list_suffix l n
    end.


A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n


A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
∀ l : list A,
  map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
 
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_suffix (a :: l) (S n)) =
list_suffix (map f (a :: l)) (S n)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n

  apply IHn.
Qed.

Fixpoint list_prefix
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  (n : nat)
  : list A
  := match n,l with
    | 0,_ => []
    | _,[] => []
    | S n, a :: l => a :: list_prefix l n
    end.


A: Type
l, left, right: list A
left_len: nat
Hlen: left_len = length left
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l left_len = left


A: Type
l, left, right: list A
left_len: nat
Hlen: left_len = length left
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
left, right: list A
left_len: nat
Hlen: left_len = length left
∀ l : list A,
  l = left ++ right → list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
right: list A
left_len: nat
∀ left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
left_len: nat
∀ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
∀ (left_len : nat) (right left : list A),
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
∀ right left : list A,
  0 = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right → list_prefix l 0 = left
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: ∀ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left
∀ right left : list A,
  S left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l (S left_len) = left

  
A: Type
∀ right left : list A,
  0 = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right → list_prefix l 0 = left
 
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: 0 = length left
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = left

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: length left = 0
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = left

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: left = []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = left

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: left = []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = []

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: left = []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
(fix list_prefix
   (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) {struct l} :
     list A :=
   match n with
   | 0 => []
   | S n0 =>
       match l with
       | [] => []
       | a :: l0 => a :: list_prefix A l0 n0
       end
   end) A l 0 = []

    destruct l;
    reflexivity.
  
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: ∀ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left
∀ right left : list A,
  S left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l (S left_len) = left
 
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: ∀ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left
right, left: list A
Hlen: S left_len = length left
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l (S left_len) = left

    
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: ∀ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left
right: list A
Hlen: S left_len = length []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = [] ++ right
list_prefix l (S left_len) = []
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: ∀ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left
right: list A
a: A
left: list A
Hlen: S left_len = length (a :: left)
l: list A
Hsplit: l = (a :: left) ++ right
list_prefix l (S left_len) = a :: left

    
A: Type

  → ∀ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      → list_prefix l left_len = left
right: list A
Hlen: S left_len = length []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = [] ++ right
list_prefix l (S left_len) = []
 discriminate Hlen.

      → list_prefix l left_len = left

        intuition.
      
A: Type

      → list_prefix l left_len = left

A: Type

left

left

H: left_len = length left

a :: left

      
A: Type
left_len: nat
right, left: list A
IHleft_len: list_prefix (left ++ right) left_len =
left
a: A
Hlen: S left_len = length (a :: left)
l: list A
Hsplit: l = (a :: left) ++ right
H: left_len = length left
a :: list_prefix (left ++ right) left_len = a :: left

      
A: Type
left_len: nat
right, left: list A
IHleft_len: list_prefix (left ++ right) left_len =
left
a: A
Hlen: S left_len = length (a :: left)
l: list A
Hsplit: l = (a :: left) ++ right
H: left_len = length left
a :: left = a :: left

      reflexivity.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n


A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
∀ l : list A,
  map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n
 
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n)) =
list_prefix (map f (a :: l)) (S n)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
f a :: map f (list_prefix l n) =
f a :: list_prefix (map f l) n

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n

  apply IHn.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlen: n ≤ length l
length (list_prefix l n) = n


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlen: n ≤ length l
length (list_prefix l n) = n

  
A: Type
n: nat
∀ l : list A,
  n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
 
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
Hlen: S n ≤ length []
length (list_prefix [] (S n)) = S n
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A,
  n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
a: A
l: list A
Hlen: S n ≤ length (a :: l)
length (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n)) = S n

  
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
Hlen: S n ≤ length []
length (list_prefix [] (S n)) = S n
 inversion Hlen.
  
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
a: A
l: list A
Hlen: S n ≤ length (a :: l)
length (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n)) = S n
 
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
a: A
l: list A
Hlen: S n ≤ S (length l)
S (length (list_prefix l n)) = S n
 
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
a: A
l: list A
Hlen: S n ≤ S (length l)
length (list_prefix l n) = n

    
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, n ≤ length l → length (list_prefix l n) = n
a: A
l: list A
Hlen: S n ≤ S (length l)
n ≤ length l

    lia.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n

  
A: Type
n: nat
∀ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
 
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
a: A
l: list A
length (list_suffix (a :: l) (S n)) =
length (a :: l) - S n

  
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
a: A
l: list A
length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
 apply IHn.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n2: nat
∀ n1 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
    list_prefix l n1
 
A: Type
l: list A
∀ n2 n1 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
    list_prefix l n1

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ 0
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) 0) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ S n2
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n2)) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ 0
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) 0) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)
 inversion Hn.
  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ S n2
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n2)) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ S n2
a :: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
a :: list_prefix l n1
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ S n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n2 n1 : nat, n1 ≤ n2 → list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 ≤ S n2
n1 ≤ n2
 lia.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l

   
A: Type
l: list A
∀ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n) ++
list_suffix (a :: l) (S n) = a :: l

   
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
a :: list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = a :: l

   
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
 apply IHl.
  Qed.

Definition list_segment
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  (n1 n2 : nat)
  := list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1.


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_suffix l n2 = l


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_suffix l n2 = l

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_suffix l n2 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_suffix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
(list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n2) ++
list_suffix l n2 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_suffix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n2 =
list_prefix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++
list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix l n1 = list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
n1 ≤ n2

  assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
P a


A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
P a

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
x: A
l0: list A
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
H: x = a
H0: l0 = l
P a
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
P a
 exact H1.
Defined.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
Forall P l


A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
Forall P l

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
x: A
l0: list A
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
H: x = a
H0: l0 = l
Forall P l
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
Forall P l
 exact H2.
Defined.


list_annotate: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l → list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
list (dsig P)


list_annotate: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l → list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
list (dsig P)

  
list_annotate: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l → list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
list (dsig P)
list_annotate: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l → list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list (dsig P)

  
list_annotate: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l → list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
list (dsig P)
 exact [].
  
list_annotate: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l → list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list (dsig P)

  exact ((dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)) :: list_annotate A P Pdec l (Forall_tl Hs)).
Defined.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l
length (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) = length (a :: l)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l
S (length (list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs))) =
S (length l)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l
S (length l) = S (length l)
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs, Hs': Forall P l
list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs, Hs': Forall P l
list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
∀ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
∀ Hs Hs' : Forall P (a :: l),
  list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs =
  list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs'

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
Hs, Hs': Forall P (a :: l)
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs) =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs')
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs')

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
Hs, Hs': Forall P (a :: l)
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs) = dexist a (Forall_hd Hs')

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
Hs, Hs': Forall P (a :: l)
`(dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)) =
`(dexist a (Forall_hd Hs'))

  reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1: list A
Hl1: Forall P l1
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P l2
list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
↔ l1 = l2


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1: list A
Hl1: Forall P l1
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P l2
list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
↔ l1 = l2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1: list A
Hl1: Forall P l1
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P l2
list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
→ l1 = l2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1: list A
∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
  → l1 = l2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hl1, Hl2: Forall P []
H: [] = []
[] = []
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hl1: Forall P []
a: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a :: l2)
H: [] =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
[] = a :: l2
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 → 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
Hl2: Forall P []
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) = []
a :: l1 = []
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 → 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hl1, Hl2: Forall P []
H: [] = []
[] = []
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hl1: Forall P []
a: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a :: l2)
H: [] =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
[] = a :: l2
 discriminate.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 → 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
Hl2: Forall P []
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) = []
a :: l1 = []
 discriminate.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 → 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 → 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
H1: a = a0
H2: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 → 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
H1: a = a0
H2: l1 = l2
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l2: list A
IHl1: ∀ (Hl1 : Forall P l2) (l3 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l3),
  list_annotate P l2 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l3 Hl2 → 
  l2 = l3
a0: A
Hl1, Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a0 :: l2 = a0 :: l2
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)

  reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P (l1 ++ l2)
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
list_annotate P l1
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P (l1 ++ l2)
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
list_annotate P l1
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P ((a :: l1) ++ l2) Hs =
list_annotate P (a :: l1)
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) (Forall_tl Hs) =
dexist a
  (Forall_hd
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)))
:: list_annotate P l1
     (Forall_tl
        (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
   list_annotate P l2
     (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs) =
dexist a
  (Forall_hd
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)))
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) (Forall_tl Hs) =
list_annotate P l1
  (Forall_tl
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs) =
dexist a
  (Forall_hd
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)))
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
`(dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)) =
`(dexist a
    (Forall_hd
       (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))))
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) (Forall_tl Hs) =
list_annotate P l1
  (Forall_tl
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: ∀ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P l1
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) (Forall_tl Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) (Forall_tl Hs))) =
list_annotate P l1
  (Forall_tl
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))
 f_equal; apply list_annotate_pi.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs
`xP ∈ l


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs
`xP ∈ l

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P [] Hs
`xP ∈ []
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs → `xP ∈ l
`xP ∈ a :: l

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P [] Hs
`xP ∈ []
 inversion Hin.

Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)

Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs

`xP ∈ a :: l
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP = dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
∨ xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs → `xP ∈ l
`xP ∈ a :: l
