A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
IHl: ∀ Hs0 : Forall P l,
  dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
  ∈ list_annotate P l Hs0
  → `(dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)) ∈ l
`(dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)) ∈ a :: l
 left.
    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs → `xP ∈ l
`xP ∈ a :: l
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
IHl: ∀ Hs : Forall P l,
  xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs → `xP ∈ l
`xP ∈ l
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
IHl: xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs) → `xP ∈ l
`xP ∈ l
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
xP: dsig P
Hin: xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
IHl: xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs) → `xP ∈ l
xP ∈ list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
xP: dsig P
xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs ↔ `xP ∈ l


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
xP: dsig P
xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs ↔ `xP ∈ l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
xP: dsig P
`xP ∈ l → xP ∈ list_annotate P l Hs

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
x: A
HPx: P x
x ∈ l → dexist x HPx ∈ list_annotate P l Hs

  induction 1; cbn; rewrite elem_of_cons, dsig_eq; cbn; auto.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
n: nat
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
n: nat
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
∀ (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l),
  ∃ oa : option (dsig P),
    nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
    ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P [] Hs) 0 = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error [] 0
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) 0 = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) 0
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
IHn: ∀ (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l),
  ∃ oa : option (dsig P),
    nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
    ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
Hs: Forall P []
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P [] Hs) (S n) = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error [] (S n)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
IHn: ∀ (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l),
  ∃ oa : option (dsig P),
    nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
    ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n

l: list A

∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) (S n) = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) (S n)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P [] Hs) 0 = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error [] 0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
nth_error (list_annotate P [] Hs) 0 = None
∧ option_map proj1_sig None = nth_error [] 0
 split; reflexivity.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) 0 = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) 0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) 0 = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) 0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) 0 =
Some (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs))
∧ option_map proj1_sig
    (Some (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs))) =
  nth_error (a :: l) 0

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
H1: P a
H2: Forall P l
nth_error
  (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
   :: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) 0 =
Some (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs))
∧ option_map proj1_sig
    (Some (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs))) =
  nth_error (a :: l) 0

    split; reflexivity.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
IHn: ∀ (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l),
  ∃ oa : option (dsig P),
    nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
    ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
Hs: Forall P []
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P [] Hs) (S n) = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error [] (S n)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
IHn: ∀ (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l),
  ∃ oa : option (dsig P),
    nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
    ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
Hs: Forall P []
nth_error (list_annotate P [] Hs) (S n) = None
∧ option_map proj1_sig None = nth_error [] (S n)
 split; reflexivity.

    ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n

l: list A

    (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
     :: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) (S n) = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) (S n)

n: nat

IHn: ∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) n =
  oa ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error
    (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
     :: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) (S n) = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) (S n)

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
oa: option (dsig P)
Hoa: nth_error (list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) n =
oa
Hnth: option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
∃ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error
    (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
     :: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) (S n) = oa
  ∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) (S n)

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
oa: option (dsig P)
Hoa: nth_error (list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) n =
oa
Hnth: option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
nth_error
  (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
   :: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)) (S n) = oa
∧ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) (S n)

    split; assumption.
Qed.

Fixpoint nth_error_filter_index
  {A} P `{∀ (x:A), Decision (P x)}
  (l : list A)
  (n : nat)
  :=
  match l with
  | [] => None
  | a :: l =>
    if decide (P a) then
      match n with
      | 0 => Some 0
      | S n => option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
      end
    else
      option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1, in2: nat
Hin1: nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1, in2: nat
Hin1: nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1: nat
Hin1: nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
∀ in2 : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
∀ in1 : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
  → ∀ in2 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
      → in1 ≤ in2

n1: nat
∀ n2 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → ∀ in1 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
      → ∀ in2 : nat,
          nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
          → in1 ≤ in2

      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1

          → in1 ≤ in2

A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → ∀ in1 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
      → ∀ in2 : nat,
          nth_error_filter_index P l n2 =
          Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1: nat
Hin1: nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n1 = Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n2 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P [] n2 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
 inversion Hin1.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,

→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2

in2: nat

in1 ≤ in2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1: nat
Hin1: (if decide (P a)
 then
  match n1 with
  | 0 => Some 0
  | S n =>
      option_map S
        (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end
 else
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1)) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n2 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
 
A: Type

n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1: nat
Hin1: (if decide (P a)
 then
  match n1 with
  | 0 => Some 0
  | S n =>
      option_map S
        (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end
 else
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1)) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: (if decide (P a)
 then
  match n2 with
  | 0 => Some 0
  | S n =>
      option_map S
        (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end
 else
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2)) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A

n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2

Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1: nat
p: P a

| 0 => Some 0
| S n =>
    option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
end = Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: match n2 with
| 0 => Some 0
| S n =>
    option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
end = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → ∀ in1 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
      → ∀ in2 : nat,
          nth_error_filter_index P l n2 =
          Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2

in1: nat
n: ¬ P a
Hin1: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

in1: nat
p: P a

in1 ≤ in2
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A

  n1 ≤ n2
  → ∀ in1 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
      → ∀ in2 : nat,
          nth_error_filter_index P l n2 =
          Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n2: nat
Hle: 0 ≤ S n2
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: Some 0 = Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → ∀ in1 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
      → ∀ in2 : nat,
          nth_error_filter_index P l n2 =
          Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1: nat
Hle: S n1 ≤ 0
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: Some 0 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
  n1 ≤ n2
  → ∀ in1 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
      → ∀ in2 : nat,
          nth_error_filter_index P l n2 =
          Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1, n2: nat
Hle: S n1 ≤ S n2
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
Hle: 0 ≤ 0
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: Some 0 = Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: Some 0 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
 inversion Hin1; inversion Hin2; subst; assumption.
      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n2: nat
Hle: 0 ≤ S n2
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: Some 0 = Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n2: nat
Hle: 0 ≤ S n2
p: P a
Hin1: Some 0 = Some 0
n: nat
Hin2: option_map S (Some n) = Some (S n)
0 ≤ S n

        lia.
      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1: nat
Hle: S n1 ≤ 0
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: Some 0 = Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
 inversion Hle.
      
A: Type

Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

A: Type

          Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2

A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1, n2: nat
Hle: S n1 ≤ S n2
in1: nat
p: P a
Hin1: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1) =
Some (S in1)
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some 0
S in1 ≤ 0
 destruct (nth_error_filter_index P l n2); inversion Hin2.

H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)

l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,

A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2, in1: nat
IHl: ∀ in2 : nat,
Some in1 = Some in2
→ ∀ in3 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in3 → in2 ≤ in3
Hin1': nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hle: S n1 ≤ S n2
p: P a
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some (S in2)
Hle': n1 ≤ n2
S in1 ≤ S in2

          
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2, in1, in2: nat
IHl: ∀ in3 : nat,
Some in1 = Some in3 → ∀ in4 : nat, Some in2 = Some in4 → in3 ≤ in4
Hin2': nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
Hin1': nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hle: S n1 ≤ S n2
p: P a
Hle': n1 ≤ n2
S in1 ≤ S in2

          
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2, in1, in2: nat
IHl: in1 ≤ in2
Hin2': nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
Hin1': nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hle: S n1 ≤ S n2
p: P a
Hle': n1 ≤ n2
S in1 ≤ S in2

          lia.
        }
    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n1 n2 : nat,
n1 ≤ n2
→ ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
in1: nat
n: ¬ P a
Hin1: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n1) =
Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
IHl: ∀ in1 : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
→ ∀ in2 : nat, nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2

in1: nat
n: ¬ P a

Some in1
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
in1 ≤ in2

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2, n0: nat
Hin1': nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some n0
IHl: ∀ in1 : nat,
  Some n0 = Some in1
  → ∀ in2 : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
      → in1 ≤ in2
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
n: ¬ P a
in2: nat
Hin2: option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n2) =
Some in2
S n0 ≤ in2

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2, n0: nat
Hin1': nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some n0
n3: nat
Hin2': nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some n3
IHl: ∀ in1 : nat,
  Some n0 = Some in1
  → ∀ in2 : nat, Some n3 = Some in2 → in1 ≤ in2
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
n: ¬ P a
S n0 ≤ S n3

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n1, n2, n0: nat
Hin1': nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some n0
n3: nat
Hin2': nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some n3
IHl: n0 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n2
n: ¬ P a
S n0 ≤ S n3

      lia.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
∃ nth : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
  ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
∃ nth : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
  ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n: nat
∀ a : A,
  nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
  nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
  nth_error (filter P []) n = Some a
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P [] n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error [] nth = Some a
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
∀ (n : nat) (a0 : A),
  nth_error (filter P (a :: l)) n = Some a0
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
  nth_error (filter P []) n = Some a
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P [] n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error [] nth = Some a
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error (filter P []) n = Some a
∃ nth : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P [] n = Some nth
  ∧ nth_error [] nth = Some a
 destruct n; inversion Hnth.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
∀ (n : nat) (a0 : A),
  nth_error (filter P (a :: l)) n = Some a0
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
Hnth: nth_error (filter P (a :: l)) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n = Some nth
  ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
Hnth: nth_error
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  nth_error_filter_index P (a :: l) n = Some nth
  ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
Hnth: nth_error
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  (if decide (P a)
   then
    match n with
    | 0 => Some 0
    | S n =>
        option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
    end
   else option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (a :: filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  match n with
  | 0 => Some 0
  | S n => option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end = Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
  nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
n0: ¬ P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (a :: filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  match n with
  | 0 => Some 0
  | S n => option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end = Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (a :: filter P l) 0 = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  Some 0 = Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
  nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
  → ∃ nth : nat,
      nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
      ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (a :: filter P l) (S n) = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0

      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (a :: filter P l) 0 = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  Some 0 = Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
a0: A
Hnth: nth_error (a0 :: filter P l) 0 = Some a0
p: P a0
∃ nth : nat,
  Some 0 = Some nth
  ∧ nth_error (a0 :: l) nth = Some a0
 exists 0; split; reflexivity.
      
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (a :: filter P l) (S n) = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (n : nat) (a : A),
nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a
→ ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a
n: nat
a0: A
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0

        
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n: nat
a0: A
IHl: ∃ nth : nat,
nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a0
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0

        
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n: nat
a0: A
nth: nat
Hnth': nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
Ha0: nth_error l nth = Some a0
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
∃ nth : nat,
  option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
  Some nth ∧ nth_error (a :: l) nth = Some a0

        
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A
n: nat
a0: A
nth: nat
Hnth': nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth
Ha0: nth_error l nth = Some a0
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
Some (S nth) ∧ nth_error (a :: l) (S nth) = Some a0

        
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
l: list A

a0: A
nth: nat

Ha0: nth_error l nth = Some a0
p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n) =
Some (S nth)

        
A: Type
P: A → Prop

p: P a
Hnth: nth_error (filter P l) n = Some a0
option_map S (Some nth) = Some (S nth)

        reflexivity.
    
A: Type

nth_error_filter_index P l n = Some nth ∧ nth_error l nth = Some a

Qed.


Forall_filter: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall P (filter P l)


Forall_filter: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall P (filter P l)

 
Forall_filter: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Forall P (filter P [])
Forall_filter: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Forall P (filter P (a :: l))

 
Forall_filter: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
Forall P (filter P [])
 exact (List.Forall_nil P).
 
Forall_filter: ∀ (A : Type) (P : A → Prop) 
  (Pdec : ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Forall P (filter P (a :: l))
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall_filter: Forall P (filter P l)
a: A
Forall P (filter P (a :: l))

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall_filter: Forall P (filter P l)
a: A
Forall P
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l)

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall_filter: Forall P (filter P l)
a: A
p: P a
Forall P (a :: filter P l)
A: Type

l: list A

a: A
n: ¬ P a
Forall P (filter P l)

l: list A
Forall_filter: Forall P (filter P l)
a: A
p: P a
Forall P (a :: filter P l)
 constructor; assumption.
    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall_filter: Forall P (filter P l)
a: A
n: ¬ P a
Forall P (filter P l)
 assumption.
Defined.
Produces the sublist of elements of a list filtered by a decidable predicate each of them paired with the proof that it satisfies the predicate. 
Definition filter_annotate
  {A : Type}
  (P : A -> Prop)
  {Pdec : forall a : A, Decision (P a)}
  (l : list A) : list (dsig P) :=
  list_annotate _ _ (Forall_filter P l).

Definition filter_annotate_length
  {A : Type}
  (P : A -> Prop)
  {Pdec : forall a : A, Decision (P a)}
  (l : list A)
  : length (filter_annotate P l) = length (filter P l) :=
  list_annotate_length _ _ (Forall_filter P l).


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
filter_annotate P (a :: l) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end)


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
filter_annotate P (a :: l) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
list_annotate P (list_filter P Pdec (a :: l))
  (Forall_filter P (a :: l)) =
match decide (P a) with
| left pa =>
    dexist a pa
    :: list_annotate P (list_filter P Pdec l)
         (Forall_filter P l)
| right _ =>
    list_annotate P (list_filter P Pdec l)
      (Forall_filter P l)
end

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
list_annotate P
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l)
  match
    decide (P a) as s
    return
      (Forall P
         (if s then a :: filter P l else filter P l))
  with
  | left p =>
      List.Forall_cons P a (filter P l) p
        (Forall_filter P l)
  | right _ => Forall_filter P l
  end =
match decide (P a) with
| left pa =>
    dexist a pa
    :: list_annotate P (list_filter P Pdec l)
         (Forall_filter P l)
| right _ =>
    list_annotate P (list_filter P Pdec l)
      (Forall_filter P l)
end

  destruct (decide _); reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2


A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2
filter_annotate P ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P (a :: l1) ++ filter_annotate P l2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2
filter_annotate P (a :: l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P (a :: l1) ++ filter_annotate P l2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2
(let fa := filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l1 in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end) ++ filter_annotate P l2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2
(let fa :=
   filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2 in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l1 in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end) ++ filter_annotate P l2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
(let fa :=
   filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2 in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l1 in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end) ++ filter_annotate P l2

  destruct (decide _); reflexivity.
Qed.
Filters a list through a predicate, then transforms each element using a function which depends on the fact that the predicate holds. 
Definition list_filter_map
  {A B : Type}
  (P : A -> Prop)
  {Pdec : forall a, Decision (P a)}
  (f : dsig P -> B)
  (l : list A)
  : list B :=
  map f (filter_annotate P l).


A, B: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
f: dsig P → B
l1, l2: list A
list_filter_map P f (l1 ++ l2) =
list_filter_map P f l1 ++ list_filter_map P f l2


A, B: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
f: dsig P → B
l1, l2: list A
list_filter_map P f (l1 ++ l2) =
list_filter_map P f l1 ++ list_filter_map P f l2

  
A, B: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
f: dsig P → B
l1, l2: list A
map f (filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2)) =
map f (filter_annotate P l1) ++
map f (filter_annotate P l2)
 
A, B: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
f: dsig P → B
l1, l2: list A
map f (filter_annotate P l1) ++
map f (filter_annotate P l2) =
map f (filter_annotate P l1) ++
map f (filter_annotate P l2)
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: i < n
nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: i < n
nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i

  
A: Type
s: list A
i: nat
∀ n : nat,
  i < n
  → nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
 
A: Type
i: nat
∀ (s : list A) (n : nat),
  i < n
  → nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i

  
A: Type
a: A
s: list A
Hi: 0 < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) 0 =
nth_error (a :: s) 0
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: ∀ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n → nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
Hi: S i < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: ∀ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n → nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
n: nat
Hi: S i < S n
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) (S n)) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)

  
A: Type
a: A
s: list A
Hi: 0 < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) 0 =
nth_error (a :: s) 0
 inversion Hi.
  
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: ∀ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n → nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
Hi: S i < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)
 inversion Hi.

nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) (S n)) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)

nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i

A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
S n ≤ length l


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
S n ≤ length l

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
∀ a : A, nth_error l n = Some a → S n ≤ length l
 
A: Type
n: nat
∀ (l : list A) (a : A),
  nth_error l n = Some a → S n ≤ length l

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
b: A
Hnth: nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some b
H0: a = b
1 ≤ S (length l)
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A),
  nth_error l n = Some a → S n ≤ length l
a: A
l: list A
b: A
Hnth: nth_error (a :: l) (S n) = Some b
H0: nth_error l n = Some b
S (S n) ≤ S (length l)

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
b: A
Hnth: nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some b
H0: a = b
1 ≤ S (length l)
 lia.
  
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a → S n ≤ length l
a: A
l: list A
b: A
Hnth: nth_error (a :: l) (S n) = Some b
H0: nth_error l n = Some b
S (S n) ≤ S (length l)
 
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
IHn: S n ≤ length l
a, b: A
Hnth: nth_error (a :: l) (S n) = Some b
H0: nth_error l n = Some b
S (S n) ≤ S (length l)

    lia.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some nth
_last: A
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some nth
_last: A
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

nth: A

_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A

_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: length (list_prefix l (S n)) = S n
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A

_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some nth
_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n

A: Type

Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
n < S n

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n = Some nth
_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last
 
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n = Some nth
_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
Hlast: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last)
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

    
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth, _last: A
Hnth: Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last) =
Some nth
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
Hlast: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last)
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last
 
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth, _last: A
Hnth: Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last) =
Some nth
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
Hlast: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last)
H0: List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last = nth
List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last =
List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

    reflexivity.
  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some nth
_last: A
Hlen: S n ≤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
→ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
n < S n
 constructor.
Qed.


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: n ≤ i
nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) = nth_error s i


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: n ≤ i
nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) = nth_error s i

  
A: Type
s: list A
i: nat
∀ n : nat,
  n ≤ i
  → nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) =
    nth_error s i
 
A: Type
i: nat
∀ (s : list A) (n : nat),
  n ≤ i
  → nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) =
    nth_error s i

  
A: Type
a: A
s: list A
n: nat
Hi: S n ≤ 0
nth_error (list_suffix (a :: s) (S n)) (0 - S n) =
nth_error (a :: s) 0
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: ∀ (s : list A) (n : nat),
n ≤ i → nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) = nth_error s i
n: nat
Hi: S n ≤ S i
nth_error (list_suffix [] (S n)) (S i - S n) =
nth_error [] (S i)
A: Type
i: nat

a: A
s: list A
n: nat
Hi: S n ≤ S i
nth_error (list_suffix (a :: s) (S n)) (S i - S n) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)

A: Type
l: list A

Hlt: i < length l
_default: A

List.last l _default

_default: A

List.last l _default

  i < length l
  → List.last (list_suffix l i) _default =
    List.last l _default

  i < length l

    List.last l _default

List.last (a :: l) _default

A: Type

l: list A

List.last (a0 :: l) _default
a: A

Hlt': i < length (a0 :: l)
List.last l a0 = List.last l a0
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type

  → List.last (list_suffix l i) _default = _default

A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 ≤ n2
i: nat
Hi1: n1 ≤ i
Hi2: i < n2
nth_error (list_segment l n1 n2) (i - n1) =
nth_error l i

Hi2: i < n2

nth_error l i

A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat

H23: n2 ≤ n3

list_segment l n1 n3


A: Type

n1, n2, n3: nat

H23: n2 ≤ n3

list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type

H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3

list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3 = l
Hl2: list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3 = l
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3 = l
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3
 
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 ++ list_suffix l n3
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: (list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3) ++ list_suffix l n3 =
(list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3) ++ list_suffix l n3
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix l n2
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
(list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1) ++
list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 ≤ n2
H23: n2 ≤ n3
Hle: n1 ≤ n3
Hl1: list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3

  assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
list_segment l n (S n) = [a]


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
list_segment l n (S n) = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a =
List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a =
List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
length (list_prefix l (S n)) - n
→ list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) = S n - n
→ list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
S n - n
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
S n - n
Hs: S n - n = 1
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
1
Hs: S n - n = 1
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n ≤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
x: list A
Heqx: x = list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n
Hlast1: List.last x a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length x = 1
Hs: S n - n = 1
x = [a]

  
A: Type
a: A
x: list A
Hlast1: List.last x a = a
Hlength: length x = 1
x = [a]

  
A: Type
a, a0: A
x: list A
Hlast1: List.last (a0 :: x) a = a
Hlength: length (a0 :: x) = 1
H0: length x = 0
a0 :: x = [a]

  
A: Type
a, a0: A
Hlast1: List.last [a0] a = a
Hlength: length [a0] = 1
H0: length [] = 0
[a0] = [a]

  simpl in Hlast1; subst; reflexivity.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
n: nat
nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)


A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
n: nat
nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
l: list A
∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ n : nat, nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)
n: nat
nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)

  apply IHl.
Qed.


index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index → Prop
(∃ n : index, P n) ↔ Exists P (enum index)


index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index → Prop
(∃ n : index, P n) ↔ Exists P (enum index)

  
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index → Prop
(∃ n : index, P n) → ∃ x : index, x ∈ enum index ∧ P x
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index → Prop
(∃ x : index, x ∈ enum index ∧ P x) → ∃ n : index, P n

  
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index → Prop
(∃ n : index, P n) → ∃ x : index, x ∈ enum index ∧ P x
 intros [n Hn]; eexists; split; [apply elem_of_enum | eassumption].
  
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index → Prop
(∃ x : index, x ∈ enum index ∧ P x) → ∃ n : index, P n
 intros (n & _ & Hn); eexists; eassumption.
Qed.

Definition map_option
  {A B : Type}
  (f : A -> option B)
  : list A -> list B
  :=
  fold_right
    (fun x lb =>
      match f x with
      | None => lb
      | Some b => b :: lb
      end
    )
    [].


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
map_option f (a :: l1) ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f (([a] ++ l1) ++ l2) =
map_option f ([a] ++ l1) ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f ([a] ++ l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f ([a] ++ l1) ++ map_option f l2
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f (l1 ++ l2)
| None => map_option f (l1 ++ l2)
end =
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l1
| None => map_option f l1
end ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
| None => map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
end =
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l1
| None => map_option f l1
end ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
b: B
b :: map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2 =
(b :: map_option f l1) ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
b: B
b :: map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2 =
([b] ++ map_option f l1) ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
b: B
b :: map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2 =
[b] ++ map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
∀ l1' l2' : list B,
  map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
  → ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f [] = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
  map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
  → ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      ∧ map_option f l1 = l1'
        ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f (a :: l) = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f [] = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: l1' ++ l2' = map_option f []
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

    
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1', l2': list B
Hl1': l1' = []
Hl2': l2' = []
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

    
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = [] ∧ map_option f l2 = []
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
[] = [] ++ []
∧ map_option f [] = [] ∧ map_option f [] = []
 repeat split.
  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f (a :: l) = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l
| None => map_option f l
end = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

    
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Hfa: f a = None
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
  map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
  → ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      ∧ map_option f l1 = l1'
        ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

    
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Hfa: f a = None
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
l1', l2': list B
Hfa: f a = None
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
_l1, l2: list A
Hl: l = _l1 ++ l2
H_l1: map_option f _l1 = l1'
Hl2: map_option f l2 = l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

      
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
∃ l1 l3 : list A,
  a :: _l1 ++ l2 = l1 ++ l3
  ∧ map_option f l1 = map_option f _l1
    ∧ map_option f l3 = map_option f l2

      
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
a :: _l1 ++ l2 = (a :: _l1) ++ l2
∧ map_option f (a :: _l1) = map_option f _l1
  ∧ map_option f l2 = map_option f l2

      
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f (a :: _l1) = map_option f _l1
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f _l1
| None => map_option f _l1
end = map_option f _l1
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f _l1 = map_option f _l1
 reflexivity.
    
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
_b: B
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = (_b :: l1') ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = _b :: l1'
    ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
  map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
  → ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      ∧ map_option f l1 = l1'
        ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [] ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = [] ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

      
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
_b: B
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = (_b :: l1') ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = _b :: l1'
    ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
_b: B
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = ([_b] ++ l1') ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = _b :: l1'
    ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
_b: B
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [_b] ++ l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = _b :: l1'
    ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
_b: B
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [_b] ++ l1' ++ l2'
H0: b = _b
H1: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = _b :: l1'
    ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [b] ++ l1' ++ l2'
H1: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = b :: l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
l1', l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [b] ++ l1' ++ l2'
H1: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
_l1, l2: list A
Hl: l = _l1 ++ l2
H_l1: map_option f _l1 = l1'
Hl2: map_option f l2 = l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = b :: l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
∃ l1 l3 : list A,
  a :: _l1 ++ l2 = l1 ++ l3
  ∧ map_option f l1 = b :: map_option f _l1
    ∧ map_option f l3 = map_option f l2

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
a :: _l1 ++ l2 = (a :: _l1) ++ l2
∧ map_option f (a :: _l1) = b :: map_option f _l1
  ∧ map_option f l2 = map_option f l2

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f (a :: _l1) = b :: map_option f _l1
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f _l1
| None => map_option f _l1
end = b :: map_option f _l1
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
b :: map_option f _l1 = b :: map_option f _l1
 reflexivity.
      
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [] ++ l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = [] ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
l2': list B
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = l2'
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = [] ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
∃ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  ∧ map_option f l1 = []
    ∧ map_option f l2 = b :: map_option f l

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
a :: l = [] ++ a :: l
∧ map_option f [] = []
  ∧ map_option f (a :: l) = b :: map_option f l

        
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
map_option f (a :: l) = b :: map_option f l
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l
| None => map_option f l
end = b :: map_option f l
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
→ ∃ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 ∧ map_option f l1 = l1' ∧ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
b :: map_option f l = b :: map_option f l
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
length (map_option f l) = length l


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
length (map_option f l) = length l

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
IHl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l → length (map_option f l) = length l
length (map_option f (a :: l)) = length (a :: l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
IHl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l → length (map_option f l) = length l
H1: f a ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
length (map_option f (a :: l)) = length (a :: l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
H1: f a ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
IHl: length (map_option f l) = length l
length (map_option f (a :: l)) = length (a :: l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
H1: f a ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
IHl: length (map_option f l) = length l
length
  match f a with
  | Some b => b :: map_option f l
  | None => map_option f l
  end = S (length l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
b: B
H1: Some b ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
IHl: length (map_option f l) = length l
length (b :: map_option f l) = S (length l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
b: B
H1: Some b ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
IHl: length (map_option f l) = length l
S (length (map_option f l)) = S (length l)
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
b: B
H1: Some b ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
IHl: length (map_option f l) = length l
length (map_option f l) = length l
 assumption.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
dummyb: B
Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
f (nth i l dummya)

Hi: i < n

f (nth i l dummya)

  
A, B: Type

l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
∀ i : nat,
  i < n
  → Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
    f (nth i l dummya)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) []
n:= 0: nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
i: nat
Hi: i < n
Some match i with
     | 0 | _ => dummyb
     end = f match i with
             | 0 | _ => dummya
             end
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
IHl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
→ ∀ i : nat,
    i < length l
    → Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
      f (nth i l dummya)
i: nat
Hi: i < n
Some
  (nth i
     match f a with
     | Some b => b :: map_option f l
     | None => map_option f l
     end dummyb) =
f match i with
  | 0 => a
  | S m => nth m l dummya
  end

n:= 0: nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
i: nat
Hi: i < n

     | 0 | _ => dummyb
     end = f match i with
             | 0 | _ => dummya
             end
 lia.

dummya: A

→ ∀ i : nat,
    i < length l
    → Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
      f (nth i l dummya)
i: nat
Hi: i < n
x: A
l0: list A
H1: f a ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
H: x = a
H0: l0 = l
Some
  (nth i
     match f a with
     | Some b => b :: map_option f l
     | None => map_option f l
     end dummyb) =
f match i with
  | 0 => a
  | S m => nth m l dummya
  end

A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
i: nat
Hi: S i < n
b: B
Hfa: Some b = f a
H1: Some b ≠ None
H2: Forall (λ a : A, f a ≠ None) l
IHl: Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
f (nth i l dummya)
Some (nth (S i) (b :: map_option f l) dummyb) =
f (nth i l dummya)

  assumption.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
b: B
b ∈ map_option f l ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ l ∧ f a = Some b)


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
b: B
b ∈ map_option f l ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ l ∧ f a = Some b)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
b: B
b ∈ [] ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ [] ∧ f a = Some b)
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
h: A
t: list A
b: B
IHt: b ∈ map_option f t ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ t ∧ f a = Some b)
b
∈ match f h with
  | Some b => b :: map_option f t
  | None => map_option f t
  end ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ h :: t ∧ f a = Some b)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
b: B
b ∈ [] ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ [] ∧ f a = Some b)
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
b: B
False ↔ (∃ a : A, False ∧ f a = Some b)
 firstorder.
  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
h: A
t: list A
b: B
IHt: b ∈ map_option f t ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ t ∧ f a = Some b)
b
∈ match f h with
  | Some b => b :: map_option f t
  | None => map_option f t
  end ↔ (∃ a : A, a ∈ h :: t ∧ f a = Some b)
 destruct (f h) eqn: Heq; setoid_rewrite elem_of_cons
    ; firstorder; subst; intuition congruence + eauto.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hab: f a = Some b
l: list A
a ∈ l → b ∈ map_option f l


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hab: f a = Some b
l: list A
a ∈ l → b ∈ map_option f l

  intro Ha; apply elem_of_map_option; exists a; intuition.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
b: B
In b (map_option f l)
↔ (∃ a : A, In a l ∧ f a = Some b)


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
b: B
In b (map_option f l)
↔ (∃ a : A, In a l ∧ f a = Some b)

  setoid_rewrite <- elem_of_list_In; apply elem_of_map_option.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hab: f a = Some b
l: list A
In a l → In b (map_option f l)


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
a: A
b: B
Hab: f a = Some b
l: list A
In a l → In b (map_option f l)

  setoid_rewrite <- elem_of_list_In; apply elem_of_map_option_rev; assumption.
Qed.
map_option can be expressed as a list_filter_map. 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l: list A
map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
IHl: map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
(λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f), is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l
map_option f (l ++ [x]) =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) (l ++ [x])

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
IHl: map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
(λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f), is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
map_option f [x] =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) (l ++ [x])
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
map_option f [x] =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) (l ++ [x])

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
map_option f [x] =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) [x]
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
map_option f [x] =
list_filter_map (is_Some ∘ f)
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) [x]

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
map
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some ∘ f)
     (if decide (is_Some (f x)) then [x] else [])
     match
       decide (is_Some (f x)) as s
       return
         (Forall (is_Some ∘ f) (if s then [x] else []))
     with
     | left p =>
         List.Forall_cons (is_Some ∘ f) x [] p
           (List.Forall_nil (is_Some ∘ f))
     | right _ => List.Forall_nil (is_Some ∘ f)
     end)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
i: is_Some (f x)
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
map
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some ∘ f) [x]
     (List.Forall_cons (is_Some ∘ f) x [] i
        (List.Forall_nil (is_Some ∘ f))))
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
n: ¬ is_Some (f x)
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
map
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some ∘ f) []
     (List.Forall_nil (is_Some ∘ f)))

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
i: is_Some (f x)
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
map
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some ∘ f) [x]
     (List.Forall_cons (is_Some ∘ f) x [] i
        (List.Forall_nil (is_Some ∘ f))))
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
i: is_Some (f x)
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
[match
   f x as mx return ((∃ x : B, mx = Some x) → B)
 with
 | Some x => λ _ : ∃ x0 : B, Some x = Some x0, x
 | None =>
     λ x : ∃ x : B, None = Some x,
       match is_Some_None x return B with
       end
 end
   (bool_decide_unpack (∃ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
      (bool_decide_pack (∃ x0 : B, f x = Some x0) i))]
 destruct (f x); [reflexivity|elim (is_Some_None (A := B)); assumption].
  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
n: ¬ is_Some (f x)
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
map
  (λ x : dsig (is_Some ∘ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some ∘ f) []
     (List.Forall_nil (is_Some ∘ f)))
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
n: ¬ is_Some (f x)
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end = []
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
b: B
n: ¬ is_Some (Some b)
[b] = []
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
x: A
l: list A
b: B
n: ¬ is_Some (Some b)
is_Some (Some b)
 eexists; reflexivity.
Qed.

(* Unpack list of [option A] into list of [A] *)
Definition cat_option {A : Type} : list (option A) -> list A :=
  @map_option (option A) A id.


cat_option [Some 1; Some 5; None; Some 6; None] =
[1; 5; 6]


cat_option [Some 1; Some 5; None; Some 6; None] =
[1; 5; 6]
 intuition. Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
length (cat_option l) = length l


A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
length (cat_option l) = length l

  apply map_option_length; intuition.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
length (cat_option l) ≤ length l


A: Type
l: list (option A)
length (cat_option l) ≤ length l

  
A: Type
length (cat_option []) ≤ length []
A: Type
a: option A
l: list (option A)
IHl: length (cat_option l) ≤ length l
length (cat_option (a :: l)) ≤ length (a :: l)

  
A: Type
length (cat_option []) ≤ length []
 intuition.
  
A: Type
a: option A
l: list (option A)
IHl: length (cat_option l) ≤ length l
length (cat_option (a :: l)) ≤ length (a :: l)
 
A: Type
a: option A
l: list (option A)
IHl: length (cat_option l) ≤ length l
length
  match a with
  | Some b => b :: cat_option l
  | None => cat_option l
  end ≤ S (length l)

    destruct (id a) eqn : eq_id; simpl in *; subst a; simpl; lia.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list (option A)
cat_option (l1 ++ l2) = cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2


A: Type
l1, l2: list (option A)
cat_option (l1 ++ l2) = cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2

  
A: Type
l2: list (option A)
cat_option ([] ++ l2) = cat_option [] ++ cat_option l2
A: Type
a: option A
l1, l2: list (option A)
IHl1: cat_option (l1 ++ l2) =
cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2
cat_option ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
cat_option (a :: l1) ++ cat_option l2

  
A: Type
l2: list (option A)
cat_option ([] ++ l2) = cat_option [] ++ cat_option l2
 
A: Type
l2: list (option A)
cat_option l2 = cat_option l2
 intuition.
  
A: Type
a: option A
l1, l2: list (option A)
IHl1: cat_option (l1 ++ l2) =
cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2
cat_option ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
cat_option (a :: l1) ++ cat_option l2
 destruct a eqn : eq_a;
      simpl in *;
      rewrite IHl1;
      reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
nth i l (Some dummya)


A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
nth i l (Some dummya)

  
A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
(Forall (λ a : option A, id a ≠ None) l
 → ∀ (n := length l) (i : nat),
     i < n
     → ∀ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
         Some (nth i (map_option id l) dummyb) =
         id (nth i l dummya))
→ Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
  nth i l (Some dummya)
 
A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
(Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
 → ∀ i : nat,
     i < length l
     → ∀ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
         Some (nth i (map_option id l) dummyb) =
         nth i l dummya)
→ Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
  nth i l (Some dummya)

  
A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
H: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
→ ∀ i : nat,
    i < length l
    → ∀ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
        Some (nth i (map_option id l) dummyb) =
        nth i l dummya
Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
nth i l (Some dummya)

  
A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
H: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
→ ∀ i : nat,
    i < length l
    → ∀ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
        Some
          (nth i
             (map_option (λ x : option A, x) l)
             dummyb) = nth i l dummya
Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
nth i l (Some dummya)

  
A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
H: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
→ ∀ i : nat,
    i < length l
    → ∀ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
        Some
          (nth i
             (map_option (λ x : option A, x) l)
             dummyb) = nth i l dummya
Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
H: Forall (λ a : option A, a ≠ None) l
→ ∀ i : nat,
    i < length l
    → ∀ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
        Some
          (nth i
             (map_option (λ x : option A, x) l)
             dummyb) = nth i l dummya
i < length l

  all : intuition.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
a: A
In a (cat_option l)
↔ (∃ b : option A, In b l ∧ b = Some a)


A: Type
l: list (option A)
a: A
In a (cat_option l)
↔ (∃ b : option A, In b l ∧ b = Some a)

  apply in_map_option.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: incl l1 l2
incl (map_option f l1) (map_option f l2)


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: incl l1 l2
incl (map_option f l1) (map_option f l2)

  
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: incl l1 l2
b: B
In b (map_option f l1) → In b (map_option f l2)
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: incl l1 l2
b: B
(∃ a : A, In a l1 ∧ f a = Some b)
→ ∃ a : A, In a l2 ∧ f a = Some b

  firstorder.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n
l1 = l2


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n
l1 = l2

  
A: Type
l1: list A
∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2

  
A: Type
a2: A
l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error [] n = nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
[] = a2 :: l2
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a :: l1) n = nth_error [] n
a :: l1 = []
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
a :: l1 = a2 :: l2

  
A: Type
a2: A
l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error [] n = nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
[] = a2 :: l2
 
A: Type
a2: A
l2: list A
Hnth: None = Some a2
[] = a2 :: l2
 inversion Hnth.
  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a :: l1) n = nth_error [] n
a :: l1 = []

a: A
l1: list A

  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
Hnth: Some a = None
a :: l1 = []
 inversion Hnth.
  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
