  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
a :: l1 = a2 :: l2
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
H0: nth_error (a :: l1) 0 = nth_error (a2 :: l2) 0
a :: l1 = a2 :: l2
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A

  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A

  nth_error (a :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
H0: Some a = Some a2
a :: l1 = a2 :: l2

l1: list A

  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
H0: Some a2 = Some a2
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a2 :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
a2 :: l1 = a2 :: l2

    
A: Type
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A

H0: Some a2 = Some a2
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a2 :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
l1 = l2

    
A: Type
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
H0: Some a2 = Some a2
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a2 :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n

    
A: Type
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
H0: Some a2 = Some a2
Hnth: ∀ n : nat,
  nth_error (a2 :: l1) n =
  nth_error (a2 :: l2) n
n: nat
nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n

    
A: Type
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A,
  (∀ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  → l1 = l2
a2: A
l2: list A
H0: Some a2 = Some a2
n: nat
Hnth: nth_error (a2 :: l1) (S n) =
nth_error (a2 :: l2) (S n)
nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n

    assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
a, b: A
la1, la2, lb1, lb2: list A
Heq: la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a ∉ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab


A: Type
a, b: A
la1, la2, lb1, lb2: list A
Heq: la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a ∉ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab

  
A: Type
a, b: A
la1, la2, lb1: list A
∀ lb2 : list A,
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
 
A: Type
a, b: A
la1, lb1: list A
∀ la2 lb2 : list A,
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab

  
A: Type
a: A
la1, lb1: list A
∀ (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
 
A: Type
a: A
la1: list A
∀ (lb1 : list A) (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab

  
A: Type
la1: list A
∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab

  
A: Type
b: A
lb2: list A
Ha: b ∉ b :: lb2
Heq: b :: lb2 = b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, [] = b :: lab
A: Type
b0: A
lb1: list A
b: A
lb2: list A
Ha: b0 ∉ b :: lb2
Heq: b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: lab
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b: A
la2: list A
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
Heq: b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
∃ lab : list A, [] = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b0: A
lb1: list A
b: A
la2, lb2: list A
Heq: b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: lb2
H1: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab

  
A: Type
b: A
lb2: list A
Ha: b ∉ b :: lb2
Heq: b :: lb2 = b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, [] = b :: lab
 
A: Type
b: A
lb2: list A
Ha: ¬ (b = b ∨ b ∈ lb2)
Heq: b :: lb2 = b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, [] = b :: lab

    
A: Type
b: A
lb2: list A
Heq: b :: lb2 = b :: lb2
b = b ∨ b ∈ lb2
 
A: Type
b: A
lb2: list A
Heq: b :: lb2 = b :: lb2
b = b
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
b0: A
lb1: list A
b: A
lb2: list A
Ha: b0 ∉ b :: lb2
Heq: b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: lab
 
A: Type
b0: A
lb1: list A
b: A
lb2: list A
Ha: b0 ∉ b :: lb2
Heq: b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: lb1
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b: A
la2: list A
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
Heq: b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
∃ lab : list A, [] = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab
 
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b: A
la2: list A
Ha: ¬ (a0 = b ∨ a0 ∈ la1 ++ a0 :: la2)
Heq: b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
∃ lab : list A, [] = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab

    
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b: A
la2: list A
Heq: b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
a0 = b ∨ a0 ∈ la1 ++ a0 :: la2
 
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b: A
la2: list A
Heq: b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
a0 ∈ la1 ++ a0 :: la2

    
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b: A
la2: list A
Heq: b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2
a0 ∈ la1 ∨ a0 ∈ a0 :: la2

    right; left; reflexivity.
  
A: Type
la1: list A
IHla1: ∀ (a : A) (lb1 : list A) 
  (b : A) (la2 lb2 : list A),
  la1 ++ a :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
  → a ∉ b :: lb2
    → ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a :: lab
a0, b0: A
lb1: list A
b: A
la2, lb2: list A
Heq: b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: lb2
H1: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab
 
A: Type
la1: list A
a0: A
lb1: list A
IHla1: ∃ lab : list A, lb1 = la1 ++ a0 :: lab
b0, b: A
la2, lb2: list A
Heq: b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: lb2
H1: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab

    
A: Type
la1: list A
a0: A
lb1, la0b: list A
Hla0b: lb1 = la1 ++ a0 :: la0b
b0, b: A
la2, lb2: list A
Heq: b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: lb2
H1: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
∃ lab : list A, b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: lab

    
A: Type
la1: list A
a0: A
lb1, la0b: list A
Hla0b: lb1 = la1 ++ a0 :: la0b
b0, b: A
la2, lb2: list A
Heq: b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = b0 :: lb1 ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: lb2
H1: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 = lb1 ++ b :: lb2
b0 :: lb1 = b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la0b
 
A: Type
la1: list A
a0: A
la0b: list A
b0, b: A
la2, lb2: list A
Heq: b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 =
b0 :: (la1 ++ a0 :: la0b) ++ b :: lb2
Ha: a0 ∉ b :: lb2
H1: la1 ++ a0 :: la2 =
(la1 ++ a0 :: la0b) ++ b :: lb2
b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la0b = b0 :: la1 ++ a0 :: la0b
 reflexivity.
Qed.

(* TODO remove (we have Exists_first) *)

A: Type
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P l
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix


A: Type
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P l
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P []
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ [] = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
IHl: Exists P l
→ ∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
    P first
    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P []
∃ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ [] = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix
 inversion Hsomething.

    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  P first
  ∧ a :: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

    ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

A: Type

l: list A

      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  P first
  ∧ a :: l = [] ++ [first] ++ suffix ∧ ¬ Exists P []
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A

    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

  P first
  ∧ a :: l = [] ++ [first] ++ l ∧ ¬ Exists P []
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A

    ∧ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
      ∧ ¬ Exists P prefix

P a ∧ a :: l = [] ++ [a] ++ l ∧ ¬ Exists P []

      intro H; inversion H.

∃ (suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  ∧ a :: l = (a :: prefix) ++ [first] ++ suffix
    ∧ ¬ Exists P (a :: prefix)

l: list A

n: ¬ P a

A: Type
a: A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hsomething: Exists P
  (a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix)
Hfirst: P first
Hprefix: ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
Hl: Exists P (prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix)
a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
a :: prefix ++ first :: suffix
 reflexivity.

n: ¬ P a

Hprefix': Exists P (a :: prefix)

A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hfirst: P first
Heq: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
Hprefix: ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
Hl: Exists P l
Hprefix': Exists P (a :: prefix)
x: A
l0: list A
H0: Exists P prefix
H: x = a
H1: l0 = prefix
False

        
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, {P a} + {¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hfirst: P first
Heq: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
Hprefix: ¬ Exists P prefix
n: ¬ P a
Hl: Exists P l
Hprefix': Exists P (a :: prefix)
x: A
l0: list A
H0: Exists P prefix
H: x = a
H1: l0 = prefix
Exists P prefix
 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
Hin: In a (b :: l)
Hneq: b ≠ a
In a l


A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
Hin: In a (b :: l)
Hneq: b ≠ a
In a l

  
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H: b = a
Hneq: b ≠ a
In a l
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H: In a l
Hneq: b ≠ a
In a l

  
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H: b = a
Hneq: b ≠ a
In a l
 
A: Type
l: list A
a: A
Hneq: a ≠ a
In a l
 
A: Type
l: list A
a: A
Hneq: a ≠ a
a = a
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H: In a l
Hneq: b ≠ a
In a l
 assumption.
Qed.

Fixpoint one_element_decompositions
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  : list (list A * A * list A)
  :=
  match l with
  | [] => []
  | a :: l' =>
    ([], a, l')
    :: map
      (fun t => match t with (l1, b, l2) => (a :: l1, b, l2) end)
      (one_element_decompositions l')
  end.


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
l, pre: list A
x: A
∀ suf : list A,
  (pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l
  ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
 
A: Type
l, pre: list A
∀ (x : A) (suf : list A),
  (pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l
  ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
 
A: Type
l: list A
∀ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
  (pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l
  ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: (pre, x, suf) ∈ []
pre ++ x :: suf = []
A: Type
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: pre ++ x :: suf = []
(pre, x, suf) ∈ []
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: (pre, x, suf)
∈ ([], a, l)
  :: map
       (λ t : list A * A * list A,
          let (y, l2) := t in
          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions l)
pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l
(pre, x, suf)
∈ ([], a, l)
  :: map
       (λ t : list A * A * list A,
          let (y, l2) := t in
          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions l)

  
A: Type
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: (pre, x, suf) ∈ []
pre ++ x :: suf = []
 inversion H.
  
A: Type
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: pre ++ x :: suf = []
(pre, x, suf) ∈ []
 destruct pre; inversion H.
  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: (pre, x, suf)
∈ ([], a, l)
  :: map
       (λ t : list A * A * list A,
          let (y, l2) := t in
          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions l)
pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l

       (λ t : list A * A * list A,

          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions l)
[] ++ a :: l = a :: l

    (λ t : list A * A * list A,

       let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))

H: ([], a, l)

          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))

    (λ t : list A * A * list A,
       let (y, l2) := t in
       let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))

A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: (pre, x, suf)
∈ ([], a, l)
  :: map
       (λ t : list A * A * list A,
          let (y, l2) := t in
          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions l)
x0: (list A * A * list A)%type
Heq: (pre, x, suf) = (let (y, l2) := x0 in let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
Hin: x0 ∈ one_element_decompositions l
pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l

      
A: Type
a: A
l: list A

(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

suf: list A

       (λ t : list A * A * list A,
          let (y, l2) := t in
          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions l)

sufx0: list A

pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l

       (λ t : list A * A * list A,

          let (l1, b) := y in (a :: l1, b, l2))
       (one_element_decompositions
          (prex0 ++ [x0] ++ sufx0))
Heq: (pre, x, suf) = (a :: prex0, x0, sufx0)
H1: pre = a :: prex0
H2: x = x0
H3: suf = sufx0
(a :: prex0) ++ x0 :: sufx0 =
a :: prex0 ++ [x0] ++ sufx0
 reflexivity.

A: Type
a: A
l: list A

(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

suf: list A
H: (a0 :: pre) ++ x :: suf = a :: l

  (a0 :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  ∧ y ∈ one_element_decompositions l

   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))

A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l ↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
a0: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: a0 :: pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l
H1: a0 = a
H2: pre ++ x :: suf = l
∃ y : list A * A * list A,
  (a :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  ∧ y ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
 
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: a :: pre ++ x :: suf = a :: pre ++ x :: suf
IHl: ∀ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
↔ pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
∃ y : list A * A * list A,
  (a :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  ∧ y ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
 
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
↔ pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
∃ y : list A * A * list A,
  (a :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  ∧ y ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)

      
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
↔ pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
(a :: pre, x, suf) = (a :: pre, x, suf)
∧ (pre, x, suf)
  ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)

      
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
↔ pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
(pre, x, suf)
∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)

      
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
IHl: ∀ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) ∈ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
↔ pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
pre ++ [x] ++ suf = pre ++ x :: suf
 reflexivity.
Qed.


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
In (pre, x, suf) (one_element_decompositions l)
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
In (pre, x, suf) (one_element_decompositions l)
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
(pre, x, suf) ∈ one_element_decompositions l
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
 apply elem_of_one_element_decompositions.
Qed.

Definition two_element_decompositions
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  : list (list A * A * list A * A * list A)
  :=
  flat_map
    (fun t =>
      match t with
        (l1, e1, l2) =>
        map
          (fun t => match t with (l2',e2, l3) => (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3) end)
          (one_element_decompositions l2)
      end
    )
    (one_element_decompositions l).


A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (two_element_decompositions l)
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l


A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (two_element_decompositions l)
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (flat_map
     (λ t : list A * A * list A,
        let (y, l2) := t in
        let (l1, e1) := y in
        map
          (λ t0 : list A * A * list A,
             let (y0, l3) := t0 in
             let (l2', e2) := y0 in
             (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
          (one_element_decompositions l2))
     (one_element_decompositions l))
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

x, y: A
(∃ x0 : list A * A * list A,
   In x0 (one_element_decompositions l)
   ∧ In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
       (let (y, l2) := x0 in
        let (l1, e1) := y in
        map
          (λ t : list A * A * list A,
             let (y0, l3) := t in
             let (l2', e2) := y0 in
             (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
          (one_element_decompositions l2)))
↔ pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

x, y: A
pre': list A
x': A
sufx: list A

  (one_element_decompositions l)
Hin: In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)

     (λ t : list A * A * list A,
        let (y, l3) := t in

  (one_element_decompositions l)

  (one_element_decompositions sufx)

H2: mid' = mid
H3: y' = y
H4: suf' = suf
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

x, y: A

A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l
→ ∃ x0 : list A * A * list A,
    In x0 (one_element_decompositions l)
    ∧ In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
        (let (y, l2) := x0 in
         let (l1, e1) := y in
         map
           (λ t : list A * A * list A,
              let (y0, l3) := t in
              let (l2', e2) := y0 in
              (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
           (one_element_decompositions l2))

           (one_element_decompositions l2))

       (λ t : list A * A * list A,

A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (map
     (λ t : list A * A * list A,
        let (y, l3) := t in
        let (l2', e2) := y in (pre, x, l2', e2, l3))
     (one_element_decompositions sufx))

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
∃ x0 : list A * A * list A,
  (let (y, l3) := x0 in
   let (l2', e2) := y in (pre, x, l2', e2, l3)) =
  (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  ∧ In x0 (one_element_decompositions sufx)
 
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
(pre, x, mid, y, suf) = (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
∧ In (mid, y, suf) (one_element_decompositions sufx)

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
In (mid, y, suf) (one_element_decompositions sufx)

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
mid ++ [y] ++ suf = sufx
 
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: pre1 ++ suf1 = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')


A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: pre1 ++ suf1 = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2, l: list A
Heql: l = pre1 ++ suf1
Heq: l = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2, l: list A
Heql: l = pre1 ++ suf1
l = pre2 ++ suf2
→ pre1 = pre2
  ∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
    ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2, l: list A
l = pre1 ++ suf1
→ l = pre2 ++ suf2
  → pre1 = pre2
    ∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
      ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  
A: Type
l: list A
∀ pre1 suf1 pre2 suf2 : list A,
  l = pre1 ++ suf1
  → l = pre2 ++ suf2
    → pre1 = pre2
      ∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
        ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heql: [] = pre1 ++ suf1
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pre1 suf1 pre2 suf2 : list A,
  l = pre1 ++ suf1
  → l = pre2 ++ suf2
    → pre1 = pre2
      ∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
        ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A,
             pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heql: a :: l = pre1 ++ suf1
Heq: a :: l = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heql: [] = pre1 ++ suf1
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')
 
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heql: [] = pre1 ++ suf1
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2

    
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heql: pre1 ++ suf1 = []
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
 
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heql: pre1 = [] ∧ suf1 = []
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
 
A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Hpre1: pre1 = []
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
 
A: Type
suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: [] = pre2 ++ suf2
[] = pre2

    
A: Type
suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: pre2 ++ suf2 = []
[] = pre2
 
A: Type
suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: pre2 = [] ∧ suf2 = []
[] = pre2
 
A: Type
suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Hpre2: pre2 = []
[] = pre2
 
A: Type
suf1, suf2: list A
[] = []

    reflexivity.

→ pre1 = pre2

Hgt: pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
a :: pre1 = a :: pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A,
       a :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')

        
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2, suf1': list A
Hgt: pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
(∃ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1')
∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, a :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')
 
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2, suf1': list A
Hgt: pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
∃ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1'
 
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2, suf1': list A
Hgt: pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1'
 
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2, suf1': list A
Hgt: pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
a :: pre1 = a :: pre2 ++ suf1'
 
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2, suf1': list A
Hgt: pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1'
 assumption.
      
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2: list A
Hlt: ∃ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
a :: pre1 = a :: pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A,
       a :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')
 
A: Type
a: A
l, pre1, pre2, suf2': list A
Hlt: pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2'
suf1, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
a :: pre1 = a :: pre2
∨ (∃ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1')
  ∨ (∃ suf2' : list A,
       a :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')

        
A: Type

suf1, suf2: list A

H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
(∃ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1')
∨ (∃ suf2' : list A, a :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')

Qed.


l: list nat
nz: list_max l > 0
In (list_max l) l


l: list nat
nz: list_max l > 0
In (list_max l) l

  
nz: list_max [] > 0
In (list_max []) []
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: list_max (a :: l) > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 → In (list_max l) l
In (list_max (a :: l)) (a :: l)

  
nz: list_max [] > 0
In (list_max []) []
 
nz: 0 > 0
In (list_max []) []
 lia.
  
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: list_max (a :: l) > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 → In (list_max l) l
In (list_max (a :: l)) (a :: l)
 
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 → In (list_max l) l

eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = false
a = a `max` list_max l ∨ In (a `max` list_max l) l

H: a `max` list_max l = a
a = a

      reflexivity.
Qed.

      lia.
    
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0

H: a `max` list_max l = a
a `max` list_max l ∈ a :: l

l: list nat
nz: a > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 → list_max l ∈ l
Hle: ¬ a ≤ list_max l
H: a `max` list_max l = a
a ∈ a :: l

    left.
Qed.

n: nat
l: list nat
Hne: n :: l ≠ []
eq_max: list_max (n :: l) = 0
Hle: n ≤ 0
0 ∈ n :: l
 
n: nat
l: list nat
Hne: n :: l ≠ []
eq_max: list_max (n :: l) = 0
Hle: n ≤ 0
0 ∈ n :: l

    
n: nat
l: list nat
Hne: n :: l ≠ []
eq_max: list_max (n :: l) = 0
Hle: n ≤ 0
Hn0: n = 0
0 ∈ n :: l

    rewrite Hn0; left.
  
l: list nat
Hne: l ≠ []
n: nat
eq_max: list_max l = S n
S n ∈ l
 
l: list nat
Hne: l ≠ []
n: nat
eq_max: list_max l = S n
Hmax: list_max l > 0 → list_max l ∈ l
S n ∈ l

Hne: l ≠ []
n: nat
eq_max: list_max l = S n
Hmax: list_max l > 0 → list_max l ∈ l
list_max l > 0
l: list nat
Hne: l ≠ []
n: nat
eq_max: list_max l = S n
Hmax: list_max l ∈ l
S n ∈ l
 
l: list nat
Hne: l ≠ []
n: nat
eq_max: list_max l = S n
Hmax: list_max l ∈ l
S n ∈ l
 
l: list nat
Hne: l ≠ []
n: nat
eq_max: list_max l = S n
Hmax: list_max l ∈ l
list_max l ∈ l

    assumption.
Qed.

(* Returns all values which occur with maximum frequency in the given list.
   Note that these values are returned with their original multiplicity. *)

Definition mode
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l : list A) : list A  :=
  let mode_value := list_max (List.map (count_occ decide_eq l) l) in
  filter (fun a => (count_occ decide_eq l a) = mode_value) l.


mode [1; 1; 2; 3; 3] = [1; 1; 3; 3]


mode [1; 1; 2; 3; 3] = [1; 1; 3; 3]
 intuition. Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
Hne: l ≠ []
mode l ≠ []


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
Hne: l ≠ []
mode l ≠ []

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
Hne: [] ≠ []
mode [] ≠ []
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
Hne: a :: l ≠ []
mode (a :: l) ≠ []

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
Hne: [] ≠ []
[] = []
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
Hne: a :: l ≠ []
mode (a :: l) ≠ []
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
Hne: a :: l ≠ []
mode (a :: l) ≠ []

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l, l': list A
Heql': l' = a :: l
Hne: l' ≠ []
mode l' ≠ []

  
A: Type

Hne: l' ≠ []
occurrences: list nat
Heqoccurrences: occurrences =
map (count_occ decide_eq l') l'
mode l' ≠ []

(if decide (a = a)
 then S (count_occ decide_eq l a)
 else count_occ decide_eq l a)
`max` list_max
        (map
           (λ x : A,
              if decide (a = x)
              then S (count_occ decide_eq l x)
              else count_occ decide_eq l x) l) > 0

contra: mode l' = []
False

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l, l': list A
Heql': l' = a :: l
Hne: l' ≠ []
occurrences: list nat
Heqoccurrences: occurrences =
map (count_occ decide_eq l') l'

x: A

H0: ∃ a : A, In a []
contra: mode l' = []
False

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l, l': list A
Heql': l' = a :: l
Hne: l' ≠ []
occurrences: list nat
Heqoccurrences: occurrences =
map (count_occ decide_eq l') l'
Hmaxp: list_max occurrences > 0
x: A
H: count_occ decide_eq l' x = list_max occurrences
x0: A
H0: In x0 []
contra: mode l' = []
False

  intuition.
Qed.

(* Computes the list suff which satisfies <<pref ++ suff = l>> or
   reports that no such list exists. *)

Fixpoint complete_prefix
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l pref : list A) : option (list A) :=
  match l, pref with
  | l , [] => Some l
  | [], (b :: pref') => None
  | (a :: l'), (b :: pref') => match (decide_eq a b) with
                               | right _ => None
                               | _ => let res' := complete_prefix l' pref' in
                                      match res' with
                                      | None => None
                                      | Some s => Some s
                                      end
                               end
  end.


complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 2] = Some [3; 4]


complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 2] = Some [3; 4]
 intuition. Qed.

complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 3] = None


complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 3] = None
 intuition. Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
complete_prefix l [] = Some l


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
complete_prefix l [] = Some l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
complete_prefix [] [] = Some []
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: complete_prefix l [] = Some l
complete_prefix (a :: l) [] = Some (a :: l)

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
complete_prefix [] [] = Some []
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
Some [] = Some []
 reflexivity.
  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: complete_prefix l [] = Some l
complete_prefix (a :: l) [] = Some (a :: l)
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: complete_prefix l [] = Some l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l, l0: list A
IHl: Some l0 = Some l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: None = Some l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l, l0: list A
IHl: Some l0 = Some l
H0: l0 = l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: None = Some l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: None = Some l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)

    discriminate IHl.
Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff ↔ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff ↔ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
complete_prefix l pref = Some suff → l = pref ++ suff

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref: list A
∀ suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
∀ pref suff : list A,
  [] = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
∀ pref suff : list A,
  a :: l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix (a :: l) pref = Some suff

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
∀ pref suff : list A,
  [] = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
pref, suff: list A
H: [] = pref ++ suff
complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
pref, suff: list A
H: [] = pref ++ suff
match pref with
| [] => Some []
| _ :: _ => None
end = Some suff

      destruct pref; destruct suff;
      try reflexivity;
      try discriminate H.
    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
∀ pref suff : list A,
  a :: l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix (a :: l) pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
pref, suff: list A
H: a :: l = pref ++ suff
complete_prefix (a :: l) pref = Some suff

      
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
pref, suff: list A
H: a :: l = pref ++ suff
match pref with
| [] => Some (a :: l)
| b :: pref' =>
    if decide (a = b)
    then
     match
       (fix complete_prefix
          (A : Type) (EqDecision0 : EqDecision A)
          (l pref : list A) {struct l} :
            option (list A) :=
          match l with
          | [] =>
              match pref with
              | [] => Some l
              | _ :: _ => None
              end
          | a :: l' =>
              match pref with
              | [] => Some l
              | b0 :: pref'0 =>
                  if decide (a = b0)
                  then
                   match
                     complete_prefix A EqDecision0 l'
                       pref'0
                   with
                   | Some s => Some s
                   | None => None
                   end
                  else None
              end
          end) A EqDecision0 l pref'
     with
     | Some s => Some s
     | None => None
     end
    else None
end = Some suff

      
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
suff: list A
H: a :: l = [] ++ suff
Some (a :: l) = Some suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
a0: A
pref, suff: list A
H: a :: l = (a0 :: pref) ++ suff
(if decide (a = a0)
 then
  match
    (fix complete_prefix
       (A : Type) (EqDecision0 : EqDecision A)
       (l pref : list A) {struct l} :
         option (list A) :=
       match l with
       | [] =>
           match pref with
           | [] => Some l
           | _ :: _ => None
           end
       | a :: l' =>
           match pref with
           | [] => Some l
           | b :: pref' =>
               if decide (a = b)
               then
                match
                  complete_prefix A EqDecision0 l'
                    pref'
                with
                | Some s => Some s
                | None => None
                end
               else None
           end
       end) A EqDecision0 l pref
  with
  | Some s => Some s
  | None => None
  end
 else None) = Some suff

  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
suff: list A
H: a :: l = [] ++ suff
Some (a :: l) = Some suff

a :: l = suff
 intuition.
      
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A

  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

    (fix complete_prefix
       (A : Type) (EqDecision0 : EqDecision A)
       (l pref : list A) {struct l} :
         option (list A) :=

       | [] =>
           match pref with
           | [] => Some l

           end

           | [] => Some l
           | b :: pref' =>
               if decide (a = b)

                    pref'
                with
                | Some s => Some s
                | None => None
                end
               else None

  | Some s => Some s

 else None) = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
a0: A
pref, suff: list A
H: a :: l = (a0 :: pref) ++ suff
e: a = a0
eq_d: decide (a = a0) = left e
match
  (fix complete_prefix
     (A : Type) (EqDecision0 : EqDecision A)
     (l pref : list A) {struct l} : option (list A) :=
     match l with
     | [] =>
         match pref with
         | [] => Some l
         | _ :: _ => None
         end
     | a :: l' =>
         match pref with
         | [] => Some l
         | b :: pref' =>
             if decide (a = b)
             then
              match
                complete_prefix A EqDecision0 l' pref'
              with
              | Some s => Some s
              | None => None
              end
             else None
         end
     end) A EqDecision0 l pref
with
| Some s => Some s
| None => None
end = Some suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A

  l = pref ++ suff
  → complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
a0: A
pref, suff: list A
H: a :: l = (a0 :: pref) ++ suff
n: a ≠ a0
eq_d: decide (a = a0) = right n
None = Some suff

  Some suff

→ (fix complete_prefix
     (A : Type) (EqDecision0 : EqDecision A)
     (l pref : list A) {struct l} :
       option (list A) :=
     match l with
     | [] =>
         match pref with
         | [] => Some l
         | _ :: _ => None
         end
     | a :: l' =>
         match pref with
         | [] => Some l
         | b :: pref' =>
             if decide (a = b)
             then
              match
                complete_prefix A EqDecision0 l'
                  pref'
              with
              | Some s => Some s
              | None => None
              end
             else None
         end
     end) A EqDecision0 l pref = 
  Some suff

H: a :: l = a0 :: pref ++ suff
e: a = a0
eq_d: decide (a = a0) = left e
H1: a = a0
H2: l = pref ++ suff
pref ++ suff = pref ++ suff

A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
complete_prefix l pref = Some suff → l = pref ++ suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref: list A
∀ suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff

l: list A

  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff

pref, suff: list A
H: complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
[] = pref ++ suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff
pref, suff: list A
H: complete_prefix (a :: l) pref = Some suff
a :: l = pref ++ suff

     
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
pref, suff: list A
H: complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
[] = pref ++ suff
 destruct pref; destruct suff;
       try intuition;
       try discriminate H.
     
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff
pref, suff: list A
H: complete_prefix (a :: l) pref = Some suff
a :: l = pref ++ suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff
pref, suff: list A
eq_pref: pref = []
H: complete_prefix (a :: l) [] = Some suff
a :: l = [] ++ suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff
pref, suff: list A
a0: A
l0: list A
eq_pref: pref = a0 :: l0
H: complete_prefix (a :: l) (a0 :: l0) = Some suff
a :: l = (a0 :: l0) ++ suff

A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff
pref, suff: list A
a0: A
l0: list A
eq_pref: pref = a0 :: l0
e: a = a0
l1: list A
eq_cp: complete_prefix l l0 = Some l1
H: Some l1 = Some suff
a :: l = a0 :: l0 ++ suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ pref suff : list A,
  complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
  → l = pref ++ suff
pref, suff: list A
a0: A
l0: list A
eq_pref: pref = a0 :: l0
e: a = a0
eq_cp: complete_prefix l l0 = None
H: None = Some suff
a :: l = a0 :: l0 ++ suff

n: a ≠ a0
H: None = Some suff
a :: l = a0 :: l0 ++ suff

       discriminate H.
Qed.

(* Computes the list pref which satisfies <<pref ++ suff = l>> or
   reports that no such list exists. *)

Definition complete_suffix
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l suff : list A) : option (list A) :=
  let res := complete_prefix (rev l) (rev suff) in
  match res with
  | None => None
  | Some ls => Some (rev ls)
  end.


complete_suffix [1; 2; 3; 4] [3; 4] = Some [1; 2]


complete_suffix [1; 2; 3; 4] [3; 4] = Some [1; 2]
 intuition. Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff ↔ complete_suffix l suff = Some pref


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff ↔ complete_suffix l suff = Some pref

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff
↔ match complete_prefix (rev l) (rev suff) with
  | Some ls => Some (rev ls)
  | None => None
  end = Some pref

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff
→ match complete_prefix (rev l) (rev suff) with
  | Some ls => Some (rev ls)
  | None => None
  end = Some pref
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
match complete_prefix (rev l) (rev suff) with
| Some ls => Some (rev ls)
| None => None
end = Some pref → l = pref ++ suff

  | Some ls => Some (rev ls)
  | None => None
  end = Some pref

A: Type

| Some ls => Some (rev ls)
| None => None

A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
eq_c: complete_prefix (rev l) (rev suff) = None
H: None = Some pref
l = pref ++ suff

    discriminate H.
Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
complete_suffix l [] = Some l


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
complete_suffix l [] = Some l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
match complete_prefix (rev l) (rev []) with
| Some ls => Some (rev ls)
| None => None
end = Some l
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
match complete_prefix (rev l) [] with
| Some ls => Some (rev ls)
| None => None
end = Some l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
Some (rev (rev l)) = Some l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
rev (rev l) = l

  apply rev_involutive.
Qed.
elements belonging to first type in a list of a sum type 
Definition list_sum_project_left
  {A B : Type}
  (x : list (A + B))
  : list A
  :=
  map_option sum_project_left x.
elements belonging to second type in a list of a sum type 
Definition list_sum_project_right
  {A B : Type}
  (x : list (A + B))
  : list B
  :=
  map_option sum_project_right x.


l: list bool
foldr andb false l = false


l: list bool
foldr andb false l = false

  
foldr andb false [] = false
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
foldr andb false (a :: l) = false

  
foldr andb false [] = false
 reflexivity.
  
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
foldr andb false (a :: l) = false
 
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
a && foldr andb false l = false
 
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
a && false = false
 apply andb_false_r.
Qed.


A: Type

l: list A
finite_l: Listing l
finite.Finite A

finite.Finite A

l: list A

∀ x : A, x ∈ l

 apply finite_l.

x ∈ l

In x l
 apply finite_l.
Defined.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A

finite.Finite A


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
finite_l: Listing l
finite.Finite A

  apply (Listing_finite_transparent finite_l).
Qed.


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
(∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x})
→ ∀ l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
(∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x})
→ ∀ l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
X: ∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
{Forall P []} + {Exists Q []}
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
X: ∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
a: A
l: list A
IHl: {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}
{Forall P (a :: l)} + {Exists Q (a :: l)}

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
X: ∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
Forall P []
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
X: ∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
a: A
l: list A
IHl: {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}
{Forall P (a :: l)} + {Exists Q (a :: l)}
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
X: ∀ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
a: A
l: list A
IHl: {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}
{Forall P (a :: l)} + {Exists Q (a :: l)}

  refine (if X a then if IHl then left _ else right _ else right _);constructor;assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
f, g: A → nat
l: list A
(∀ a : A, In a l → f a ≤ g a)
→ Exists (λ a : A, f a < g a) l
  → list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)


A: Type
f, g: A → nat
l: list A
(∀ a : A, In a l → f a ≤ g a)
→ Exists (λ a : A, f a < g a) l
  → list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)

  
A: Type
f, g: A → nat
x: A
l: list A
H: ∀ a : A, In a (x :: l) → f a ≤ g a
H0: f x < g x
list_sum (map f (x :: l)) < list_sum (map g (x :: l))
A: Type
f, g: A → nat
x: A
l: list A

H0: Exists (λ a : A, f a < g a) l
IHExists: (∀ a : A, In a l → f a ≤ g a)
→ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)
list_sum (map f (x :: l)) < list_sum (map g (x :: l))

A: Type

l: list A

H0: f x < g x
IHl: (∀ a : A, In a (x :: l) → f a ≤ g a)
→ list_sum (map f l) ≤ list_sum (map g l)
list_sum (map f (a :: l)) ≤ list_sum (map g (a :: l))

x: A
H: ∀ a : A, In a [x] → f a ≤ g a

list_sum (map f []) ≤ list_sum (map g [])

A: Type

→ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)
list_sum (map f (x :: l)) < list_sum (map g (x :: l))

→ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)
f x + list_sum (map f l) < g x + list_sum (map g l)

A: Type
f, g: A → nat
x: A
l: list A

H0: Exists (λ a : A, f a < g a) l
IHExists: (∀ a : A, In a l → f a ≤ g a)
→ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)
∀ a : A, In a l → f a ≤ g a
 intros;apply H;right;assumption.
Qed.

(* Nearly the natural induction principle for fold_left.
   Useful if you can think of [[fold_left f]] as transforming
   a list into a [[B -> B]] function, and can describe the
   effect with a [[P : list A -> relation B]].
   The assumption [[Hstep]] could be weakened by replacing [[r]]
   with [[fold_left f l (f x a)]], but that isn't useful in
   natural examples.
 *)

A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
P: list A → B → B → Prop
Hstart: ∀ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: ∀ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r → P (a :: l) x r
∀ (l : list A) (x : B), P l x (fold_left f l x)


A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
P: list A → B → B → Prop
Hstart: ∀ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: ∀ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r → P (a :: l) x r
∀ (l : list A) (x : B), P l x (fold_left f l x)

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
P: list A → B → B → Prop
Hstart: ∀ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: ∀ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r → P (a :: l) x r
∀ x : B, P [] x (fold_left f [] x)
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
P: list A → B → B → Prop
Hstart: ∀ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: ∀ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r → P (a :: l) x r
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ x : B, P l x (fold_left f l x)
∀ x : B, P (a :: l) x (fold_left f (a :: l) x)

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
P: list A → B → B → Prop
Hstart: ∀ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: ∀ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r → P (a :: l) x r
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ x : B, P l x (fold_left f l x)
∀ x : B, P (a :: l) x (fold_left f (a :: l) x)

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
P: list A → B → B → Prop
Hstart: ∀ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: ∀ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r → P (a :: l) x r
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ∀ x : B, P l x (fold_left f l x)
x: B
P (a :: l) x (fold_left f (a :: l) x)

  apply Hstep, IHl.
Qed.

(* An induction principle for fold_left which
   decomposes the list from the right
 *)

A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
∀ l : list A, P l (fold_left f l x0)


A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
∀ l : list A, P l (fold_left f l x0)

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
P [] (fold_left f [] x0)
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P (l ++ [x]) (fold_left f (l ++ [x]) x0)

  
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
P [] (fold_left f [] x0)
 apply Hstart.
  
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P (l ++ [x]) (fold_left f (l ++ [x]) x0)
 
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P (l ++ [x]) (fold_left f [x] (fold_left f l x0))
 
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P (l ++ [x]) (f (fold_left f l x0) x)

    
A, B: Type
f: B → A → B
x0: B
P: list A → B → Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: ∀ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x → P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P l (fold_left f l x0)
 assumption.
Qed.

Section suffix_quantifiers.

Quantifiers for all suffixes

In this section we define list quantifiers similar to Streams.ForAll and Streams.Exists and prove several properties about them.
Among the definitions, the more useful are ForAllSuffix2 and ExistsSuffix2 as they allow us to quantify over relations between consecutive elements. 
  Context
    [A : Type]
    (P : list A -> Prop)
    .

Inductive ExistsSuffix : list A -> Prop :=
  | SHere : forall l, P l -> ExistsSuffix l
  | SFurther : forall a l, ExistsSuffix l -> ExistsSuffix (a :: l).

Inductive ForAllSuffix : list A -> Prop :=
  | SNil : P [] -> ForAllSuffix []
  | SHereAndFurther : forall a l, P (a :: l) -> ForAllSuffix l -> ForAllSuffix (a :: l).


A: Type
P: list A → Prop
∀ l : list A, ForAllSuffix l → P l


A: Type
P: list A → Prop
∀ l : list A, ForAllSuffix l → P l

  inversion 1; assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
P: list A → Prop
∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix (a :: l) → ForAllSuffix l


A: Type
P: list A → Prop
∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix (a :: l) → ForAllSuffix l

  inversion 1; assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
P: list A → Prop
∀ (m : nat) (x : list A),
  ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)


A: Type
P: list A → Prop
∀ (m : nat) (x : list A),
  ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)

  
A: Type
P: list A → Prop
m: nat
IHm: ∀ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
H: ForAllSuffix []
ForAllSuffix []
A: Type
P: list A → Prop
m: nat
IHm: ∀ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
a: A
x: list A
H: ForAllSuffix (a :: x)
ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)

  
A: Type
P: list A → Prop
m: nat
IHm: ∀ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
H: ForAllSuffix []
ForAllSuffix []
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P: list A → Prop
m: nat
IHm: ∀ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
a: A
x: list A
H: ForAllSuffix (a :: x)
ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
 
A: Type
P: list A → Prop
m: nat
IHm: ∀ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
a: A
x: list A
H: ForAllSuffix x
ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
 
A: Type
P: list A → Prop
m: nat
IHm: ∀ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x → ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
a: A
x: list A
H: ForAllSuffix x
ForAllSuffix x
 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
∀ l : list A, Inv l → ForAllSuffix l


A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
∀ l : list A, Inv l → ForAllSuffix l

  
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
H: Inv []
ForAllSuffix []
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix (a :: l)

  
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
H: Inv []
ForAllSuffix []
 
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
H: Inv []
P []
 
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
H: Inv []
Inv []
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix (a :: l)
 
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
P (a :: l)
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix l

    
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
P (a :: l)

  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l

 assumption.
    
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop

  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l

ForAllSuffix l
 
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
Inv l
 
A: Type
P, Inv: list A → Prop
InvThenP: ∀ l : list A, Inv l → P l
InvIsStable: ∀ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) → Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l → ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv l
Inv l
 assumption.
Qed.

End suffix_quantifiers.


A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
∀ l : list A, ForAllSuffix P l → ForAllSuffix Q l


A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
∀ l : list A, ForAllSuffix P l → ForAllSuffix Q l

  
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
H: P []
Q []
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
a: A
l: list A
H: P (a :: l)
H0: ForAllSuffix P l
IHForAllSuffix: ForAllSuffix Q l
Q (a :: l)
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
a: A
l: list A
H: P (a :: l)
H0: ForAllSuffix P l
IHForAllSuffix: ForAllSuffix Q l
ForAllSuffix Q l

  
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
H: P []
Q []
 
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
H: P []
P []
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
a: A
l: list A
H: P (a :: l)
H0: ForAllSuffix P l
IHForAllSuffix: ForAllSuffix Q l
Q (a :: l)
 
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
a: A
l: list A
H: P (a :: l)
H0: ForAllSuffix P l
IHForAllSuffix: ForAllSuffix Q l
P (a :: l)
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P, Q: list A → Prop
HPQ: ∀ l : list A, P l → Q l
a: A
l: list A
H: P (a :: l)
H0: ForAllSuffix P l
IHForAllSuffix: ForAllSuffix Q l
ForAllSuffix Q l
 assumption.
Qed.

Definition ForAllSuffix1 [A : Type] (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop :=
  ForAllSuffix (fun l => match l with | [] => True | a :: _ => P a end).


A: Type
P: A → Prop
∀ l : list A, ForAllSuffix1 P l ↔ Forall P l


A: Type
P: A → Prop
∀ l : list A, ForAllSuffix1 P l ↔ Forall P l

  split; induction 1; constructor; auto.
Qed.

Definition ExistsSuffix1 [A : Type] (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop :=
  ExistsSuffix (fun l => match l with | [] => False | a :: _ => P a end).


A: Type
P: A → Prop
∀ l : list A, ExistsSuffix1 P l ↔ Exists P l


A: Type
P: A → Prop
∀ l : list A, ExistsSuffix1 P l ↔ Exists P l

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
l: list A
H: match l with
| [] => False
| a :: _ => P a
end
Exists P l
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: ExistsSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => False
     | a :: _ => P a
     end) l
IHExistsSuffix: Exists P l
Exists P (a :: l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: P x
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)
A: Type
P: A → Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: Exists P l
IHExists: ExistsSuffix1 P l
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
l: list A
H: match l with
| [] => False
| a :: _ => P a
end
Exists P l
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: P a
Exists P (a :: l)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: P a
P a
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: ExistsSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => False
     | a :: _ => P a
     end) l
IHExistsSuffix: Exists P l
Exists P (a :: l)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: ExistsSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => False
     | a :: _ => P a
     end) l
IHExistsSuffix: Exists P l
Exists P l
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: P x
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: P x
P x
 assumption.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: Exists P l
IHExists: ExistsSuffix1 P l
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: Exists P l
IHExists: ExistsSuffix1 P l
ExistsSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => False
     | a :: _ => P a
     end) l
 assumption.
Qed.

Definition ForAllSuffix2 [A : Type] (R : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop :=
  ForAllSuffix (fun l => match l with | a :: b :: _ => R a b | _ => True end).


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
ForAllSuffix2 R l
↔ (∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
     l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b)


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
ForAllSuffix2 R l
↔ (∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
     l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
ForAllSuffix2 R l
→ ∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
    l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
(∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
   l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b)
→ ForAllSuffix2 R l

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
ForAllSuffix2 R l
→ ∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
    l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b
 
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
Hall: ForAllSuffix2 R l
n: nat
∀ a b : A, l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b
 
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
n: nat
Hall: ForAllSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (list_suffix l n)
∀ a b : A, l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b

     | [a] => True

     end) (list_suffix l n)

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l, l0: list A
H: ∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
  l0 !! n = Some a → l0 !! S n = Some b → R a b
match l0 with
| [] => True
| [a] => True
| a :: b :: _ => R a b
end
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
a: A
l0: list A
H: ∀ (n : nat) (a0 b : A),
  (a :: l0) !! n = Some a0
  → (a :: l0) !! S n = Some b → R a0 b
n: nat
a0, b: A
H0: l0 !! n = Some a0
H1: l0 !! S n = Some b
R a0 b

  l0 !! 0 = Some a → l0 !! 1 = Some b → R a b
match l0 with
| [] => True
| [a] => True
| a :: b :: _ => R a b

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A

  (a :: l0) !! 0 = Some a0
  → (a :: l0) !! 1 = Some b → R a0 b

| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
a, b: A
l0: list A
H: ∀ a0 b0 : A,
  (a :: b :: l0) !! 0 = Some a0
  → (a :: b :: l0) !! 1 = Some b0 → R a0 b0
R a b

      exact (H a b eq_refl eq_refl).
    
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
l: list A
a: A
l0: list A
H: ∀ (n : nat) (a0 b : A),
  (a :: l0) !! n = Some a0
  → (a :: l0) !! S n = Some b → R a0 b
n: nat
a0, b: A
H0: l0 !! n = Some a0
H1: l0 !! S n = Some b
R a0 b
 exact (H (S n) a0 b H0 H1).
Qed.


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
∀ (a b : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
  → ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
∀ (a b : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
  → ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
a, b: A
l: list A
H: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
a0: A
l0: list A
H2: R a b
H3: ForAllSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (b :: l)
H0: a0 = a
H1: l0 = b :: l
ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
 
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
a, b: A
l: list A
H: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
H2: R a b

  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (b :: l)
ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)

  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) [b]
ForAllSuffix2 R [a]

     match l with

     end) (b :: a0 :: l)

 exact I.

a1: A
l0: list A

H5: ForAllSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (a0 :: l)

  (λ l : list A,

     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (b :: a0 :: l)

  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (a0 :: l)

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
a, b, a0: A
l: list A

H3: ForAllSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (b :: a0 :: l)

  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (a0 :: l)
R a a0

    transitivity b; assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
∀ l : list A,
  ForAllSuffix2 R l
  ↔ (∀ (m n : nat) (a b : A),
       m < n
       → l !! m = Some a → l !! n = Some b → R a b)


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
∀ l : list A,
  ForAllSuffix2 R l
  ↔ (∀ (m n : nat) (a b : A),
       m < n
       → l !! m = Some a → l !! n = Some b → R a b)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
l: list A
ForAllSuffix2 R l
↔ (∀ (m n : nat) (a b : A),
     m < n → l !! m = Some a → l !! n = Some b → R a b)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
l: list A
(∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
   l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b)
↔ (∀ (m n : nat) (a b : A),
     m < n → l !! m = Some a → l !! n = Some b → R a b)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
l: list A
Hall: ∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
  l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b
∀ (m n : nat) (a b : A),
  m < n → l !! m = Some a → l !! n = Some b → R a b

HT: Transitive R
l: list A

  m < n
  → l !! m = Some a → l !! n = Some b → R a b
∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
  l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b

  l !! m = Some a
  → l !! (k + S m) = Some b → R a b

Hb: S (k + S m) < length l
k + S m < length l
 lia. 
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop

l: list A

  → l !! (k + S m) = Some b → R a b

R a b

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
l: list A
Hall: ∀ (n : nat) (a b : A),
  l !! n = Some a → l !! S n = Some b → R a b
m, k: nat
IHk: ∀ a b : A,
  l !! m = Some a
  → l !! (k + S m) = Some b → R a b
a, b: A
Ha: l !! m = Some a
Hb: l !! S (k + S m) = Some b
c: A
Hc: l !! (k + S m) = Some c
R a b

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
l: list A
b, c: A
Hall: R c b
m, k: nat
IHk: ∀ a b : A,
  l !! m = Some a
  → l !! (k + S m) = Some b → R a b
a: A
Ha: l !! m = Some a
Hb: l !! S (k + S m) = Some b
Hc: l !! (k + S m) = Some c
R a b

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
l: list A
b, c: A
Hall: R c b
m, k: nat
a: A
IHk: R a c
Ha: l !! m = Some a
Hb: l !! S (k + S m) = Some b
Hc: l !! (k + S m) = Some c
R a b

  transitivity c; assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
∀ l : list A,
  ForAllSuffix2 R l → ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)


A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
∀ l : list A,
  ForAllSuffix2 R l → ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R l → ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)
ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
→ ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P (a :: l))

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R l → ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P (a :: l))

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R l → ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix2 R (list_filter P Pdec (a :: l))
 
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R l → ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix2 R
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l)

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R

Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)

H: P a
ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: filter P l)

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)
H: P a
match filter P l with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end

→ match filter P l with
  | [] => True
  | b :: _ => R a b
  end
match filter P (a0 :: l) with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop

A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a, a0: A
l: list A
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: a0 :: l)
IHl: match filter P l with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end
match
  (if decide (P a0)
   then a0 :: filter P l
   else filter P l)
with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end
 
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a, a0: A
l: list A
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: a0 :: l)
IHl: match filter P l with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end
H: P a0
R a a0

  
A: Type
R: A → A → Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A → Prop
Pdec: ∀ a : A, Decision (P a)
a, a0: A
l: list A
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: a0 :: l)
IHl: match filter P l with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end
H: P a0
a1: A
l0: list A
H2: R a a0
H3: ForAllSuffix
  (λ l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (a0 :: l)
H0: a1 = a
H1: l0 = a0 :: l
R a a0
 assumption.
Qed.



∀ (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l ⊆ m → m ⊆ n → l ⊆ n


∀ (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l ⊆ m → m ⊆ n → l ⊆ n


A: Type
l, m, n: list A
Hlm: l ⊆ m
Hmn: m ⊆ n
x: A
y: x ∈ l
x ∈ n


A: Type
l, m, n: list A
Hlm: l ⊆ m
Hmn: m ⊆ n
x: A
y: x ∈ l
x ∈ m


A: Type
l, m, n: list A
Hlm: l ⊆ m
Hmn: m ⊆ n
x: A
y: x ∈ l
x ∈ l

assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
RelDecision subseteq


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
RelDecision subseteq

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
x: list A
∀ y : list A, Decision (x ⊆ y)

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
∀ y : list A, Decision ([] ⊆ y)
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
x: list A
IHx: ∀ y : list A, Decision (x ⊆ y)
∀ y : list A, Decision (a :: x ⊆ y)

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
∀ y : list A, Decision ([] ⊆ y)
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
y: list A
[] ⊆ y
 apply list_subseteq_nil.

∀ y : list A, Decision (a :: x ⊆ y)

n: a ∉ y

a ∈ a :: x
 left.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s1, s2: list A
s1 ⊆ s2 → filter P s1 ⊆ filter P s2


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s1, s2: list A
s1 ⊆ s2 → filter P s1 ⊆ filter P s2


A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s2: list A
H0: [] ⊆ s2
x: A
H1: x ∈ filter P []
x ∈ filter P s2
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: s1 ⊆ s2 → filter P s1 ⊆ filter P s2
H0: a :: s1 ⊆ s2
x: A
H1: x ∈ filter P (a :: s1)
x ∈ filter P s2

  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s2: list A
H0: [] ⊆ s2
x: A
H1: x ∈ filter P []
x ∈ filter P s2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s2: list A
H0: [] ⊆ s2
x: A
x ∉ filter P []

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
s2: list A
H0: [] ⊆ s2
x: A
Hx: x ∈ []
False
 inversion Hx.
  
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: s1 ⊆ s2 → filter P s1 ⊆ filter P s2
H0: a :: s1 ⊆ s2
x: A
H1: x ∈ filter P (a :: s1)
x ∈ filter P s2
 
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: s1 ⊆ s2 → filter P s1 ⊆ filter P s2
H0: a :: s1 ⊆ s2
x: A
H1: x
∈ (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P s1
   else filter P s1)
x ∈ filter P s2

    
A: Type
P: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
a: A
s1, s2: list A
IHs1: s1 ⊆ s2 → filter P s1 ⊆ filter P s2
H0: a :: s1 ⊆ s2
x: A
p: P a
H1: x ∈ a :: filter P s1
x ∈ filter P s2

H0: a :: s1 ⊆ s2

n: ¬ P a
H1: x ∈ filter P s1
x ∈ filter P s2

A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
(∀ a : A, P a → Q a)
→ ∀ s : list A, filter P s ⊆ filter Q s


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
(∀ a : A, P a → Q a)
→ ∀ s : list A, filter P s ⊆ filter Q s


A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
filter P [] ⊆ filter Q []
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: filter P s ⊆ filter Q s
filter P (a :: s) ⊆ filter Q (a :: s)

  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
filter P [] ⊆ filter Q []
 rewrite filter_nil; intros x Hx; inversion Hx.
  
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: filter P s ⊆ filter Q s
filter P (a :: s) ⊆ filter Q (a :: s)
 
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: filter P s ⊆ filter Q s
x: A
H2: x ∈ filter P (a :: s)
x ∈ filter Q (a :: s)

    
A: Type
P, Q: A → Prop
H: ∀ x : A, Decision (P x)
H0: ∀ x : A, Decision (Q x)
H1: ∀ a : A, P a → Q a
a: A
s: list A
IHs: filter P s ⊆ filter Q s
x: A
H2: x
∈ (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P s
   else filter P s)
x ∈ filter Q (a :: s)

A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
map_option f l1 ⊆ map_option f l2


A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
map_option f l1 ⊆ map_option f l2

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
b ∈ map_option f l1 → b ∈ map_option f l2
 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
b ∈ map_option f l1 → b ∈ map_option f l2

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
Hb: b ∈ map_option f l1
b ∈ map_option f l2

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
Hb: b ∈ map_option f l1
∃ a : A, a ∈ l2 ∧ f a = Some b

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
Hb: ∃ a : A, a ∈ l1 ∧ f a = Some b
∃ a : A, a ∈ l2 ∧ f a = Some b

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
a: A
Ha: a ∈ l1
Hfa: f a = Some b
∃ a : A, a ∈ l2 ∧ f a = Some b

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
a: A
Ha: a ∈ l1
Hfa: f a = Some b
a ∈ l2 ∧ f a = Some b

 
A, B: Type
f: A → option B
l1, l2: list A
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
b: B
a: A
Ha: a ∈ l2
Hfa: f a = Some b
a ∈ l2 ∧ f a = Some b

 split; assumption.
Qed.


X: Type
l: list X
(∀ v : X, v ∉ l) → l = []


X: Type
l: list X
(∀ v : X, v ∉ l) → l = []

  
X: Type
(∀ v : X, v ∉ []) → [] = []
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(∀ v : X, v ∉ a :: l) → a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(∀ v : X, v ∉ a :: l) → a :: l = []

  
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(∀ v : X, v ∉ a :: l) → a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: ∀ v : X, v ∉ a :: l
a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: ∀ v : X, v ∉ a :: l
a ∈ a :: l
 left.
Qed.


A: Type
∀ l1 l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1


A: Type
∀ l1 l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: NoDup ([] ++ l2)
NoDup []
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
NoDup (a :: l1)

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: NoDup ([] ++ l2)
NoDup []
 constructor.
  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
a ∉ l1
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
H4: a ∈ l1
False
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
H4: a ∈ l1
a ∈ l1 ++ l2

    
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
H4: a ∈ l1
a ∈ l1 ∨ a ∈ l2
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: ∀ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) → NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: a ∉ l1 ++ l2
H3: NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
H4: a ∈ l1
a ∈ l1
 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
∀ l : list A, l ⊆ [] → l = []


A: Type
∀ l : list A, l ⊆ [] → l = []

  
A: Type
l: list A
H: l ⊆ []
l = []
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: a :: l ⊆ []
a :: l = []

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: a :: l ⊆ []
False

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: a ∈ []
False

  inversion H.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
a: A
a ∈ cat_option l
↔ (∃ b : option A, b ∈ l ∧ b = Some a)


A: Type
l: list (option A)
a: A
a ∈ cat_option l
↔ (∃ b : option A, b ∈ l ∧ b = Some a)

  apply elem_of_map_option.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
Listing l → NoDup l


A: Type
l: list A
Listing l → NoDup l

 
A: Type
l: list A
Hnd: List.NoDup l
Hfull: Full l
NoDup l

 
A: Type
l: list A
Hnd: NoDup l
Hfull: Full l
NoDup l

 assumption.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
Hnodup: NoDup l1
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
length l1 ≤ length l2


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
Hnodup: NoDup l1
Hincl: l1 ⊆ l2
length l1 ≤ length l2

  apply submseteq_length, NoDup_submseteq; assumption.
Qed.


∀ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n l = l' ++ [x] → ∃ n' : nat, n = S n'


∀ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n l = l' ++ [x] → ∃ n' : nat, n = S n'

  
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take 0 l = l' ++ [x]
∃ n' : nat, 0 = S n'
A: Type
n': nat
IHn': ∀ (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n' l = l' ++ [x]
  → ∃ n'0 : nat, n' = S n'0
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take (S n') l = l' ++ [x]
∃ n'0 : nat, S n' = S n'0

  
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take 0 l = l' ++ [x]
∃ n' : nat, 0 = S n'
 
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
take 0 l ≠ l' ++ [x]
 
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
[] ≠ l' ++ [x]
 apply app_cons_not_nil.
  
A: Type
n': nat
IHn': ∀ (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n' l = l' ++ [x]
  → ∃ n'0 : nat, n' = S n'0
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take (S n') l = l' ++ [x]
∃ n'0 : nat, S n' = S n'0
 
A: Type
n': nat
IHn': ∀ (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n' l = l' ++ [x]
  → ∃ n'0 : nat, n' = S n'0
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take (S n') l = l' ++ [x]
S n' = S n'
 reflexivity.
Qed.


∀ (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (la : list A) (lb : 
                                              list B),
  (x, y) ∈ list_prod la lb ↔ x ∈ la ∧ y ∈ lb


∀ (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (la : list A) (lb : 
                                              list B),
  (x, y) ∈ list_prod la lb ↔ x ∈ la ∧ y ∈ lb

  
A, B: Type
x: A
y: B
la: list A
lb: list B
(x, y) ∈ list_prod la lb ↔ x ∈ la ∧ y ∈ lb

  
A, B: Type
x: A
y: B
la: list A
lb: list B
x ∈ la ∧ y ∈ lb ↔ x ∈ la ∧ y ∈ lb

  reflexivity.
Qed.
